Description:
Our secret weapon for flawless self tan application! A soft, washable mitt for applying self-tanning products.
This mitt ensures an even, streak-free application of St. Tropez Mousse and Spray products and protects the palms from staining.
ReviewText: Although I do use the mitt to apply my tan and it works great for that, the product is stained onto the mitt constantly dispite washing.  It also falls apart.  I hand wash it in warm water with Dove Sensitive Body Wash (a mild soap) after each use.  I only get about 3-4 weeks use out of it (I apply my tan every 3-5 days) before the black backing on it falls off and it is unusable.  Not a good quality product especially for $9.00 a piece.
Title: Poor Quality

Description:
Our secret weapon for flawless self tan application! A soft, washable mitt for applying self-tanning products.
This mitt ensures an even, streak-free application of St. Tropez Mousse and Spray products and protects the palms from staining.
ReviewText:
The mitt turns orange and ends up looking nasty and dirty after just a couple uses, but as long as you wash it after every use you're going to be fine. 

Definitely get a mitt rather than using your hand to apply any sort of self-tanner, though - not just St Tropaz products. You will regret NOT using a mitt, but you'll probably want to give your hands a good wash even after using the mitt just to be sure you don't end up with any orange blobs on your palms or wrists.
Title: Does the trick

Title: Absorbs well

Description: In addition to high protection, it was important for Biotherm to include anti-aging benefits in their line-up of sun products designed for the face. Soin Solaire Visage is a true multi-tasker. The formula is enhanced with a [BIOPEPTIDE + BIOELASTIDE] complex to slow the deterioration of the elastic fibers in the skin. Bioelastide inhibits the enzyme that, when activated by UV light, damages elastic fibers in the skin. At the same time, it also stimulates elastin synthesis* for a firming effect. Biopeptides increase fibroblast multiplication* and stimulate collagen synthesis, a process that is weakened by the effects of UV rays. *In vitro test
ReviewText:
I have been using sunscreen since I was a teenager and now I buy this for my 13 year old daughter. Now you may think 365 days a year ? I grew up way up north where the temps would hit -40 F on a regular basis during the winter months.
But it was always SUNNY , and many people do not think to protect your face from sun when its cold out. WRONG, its your best defence 
This product is light and well priced . Do your skin a favor and make it part of your daily routine !
Title: Protect yourself 365 days a year

ReviewText: Great product,  bought for my sensitive face to protect all year long when I'm outside.

Non-sticky and non-greasy, the formula melts softly onto the skin. SUN-KISSED HYDRATION. Skin maintains its sun-kissed glow even longer thanks to the Ultra-Fluid Body Milk's moisturizing properties. For her, for him - this universal milk is suited to every holiday and skincare need.
ReviewText: This stuff is great! It smells delicious, not like all the other coconut sunscreens, it soaks in quickly and doesn't leave you all oily. its light in texture which is nice too, I've put in on after applying body lotion and no gooeyness. It's a little pricey, but totally worth it.
Title: Best sunscreen ever

ReviewText: I tried this product when it launched and it has quickly become my go to body product. I keep it in my yoga bag and use it faithfully after my practice and when I get up in the morning. The massage application also allows me a few extra me moments. I have noticed visible results and even my husband has noticed, which really says something!

Title: Had to buy more

Product Name: In shower Tanning Lotion Golden Glow Medium
Description: Our most convenient way to tan, now available in a darker shade, for a deeper golden glow. This nourishing lotion gradually builds in just 3 minutes, as part of your daily shower regime. Apply for 3 consecutive days to achieve a healthy looking tan to suit all skin tones.
ReviewText: I have been using this product for 21 days.  First 14 I applied the product as directed, last 7 days I have left it on for 5-6 minutes.  I am FINALLY beginning to see the smallest evidence of change to the tone of my skin.  The good news is that it really looks like I have been in the sun.  There is absolutely no streaking or hint of orange.  This is amazing.  It has been a painfully long process but I am extremely pleased with the result.  I have no opportunity and not much desire to sit in the natural sun, so I love this option.
Title: Tan at a snail's pace

Description: Made from nylon, these comfortable, one size fits all gloves help beautify skin by scrubbing away dirt and dead skin cells.  For maximum cleansing and exfoliation pour a small amount of your favourite Bath Retreat body wash onto gloves and work up a lather by slowly massaging your body.  Your skin will be left feeling soft and smooth. Care Instructions: Rinse gloves thoroughly, squeeze out excess water and hang to dry. Avoid using on face or sensitive skin.

Product Name: Ultra Sun Protection Lotion  Broad Spectrum  SPF 50+
Description: The the biggest splash since SPF.  A world-first* UV protection technology  that gets boosted by water. Put water and perspiration on your side to boost the UV protection effect!   The new Ultra Sun Protection lotion protects the skin against strong UV rays, even under the harshest conditions.
ReviewText: Bought this 2 days ago. Works great just like others reviews. The only thing is it looks very pale on my face.
Title: Like it not love it

Product Name: Ultra Sun Protection Lotion  Broad Spectrum  SPF 50+
Description: The the biggest splash since SPF.  A world-first* UV protection technology  that gets boosted by water. Put water and perspiration on your side to boost the UV protection effect!   The new Ultra Sun Protection lotion protects the skin against strong UV rays, even under the harshest conditions.
ReviewText:
I noticed that this hasn't really been touched on in the previous reviews so I figured I would mention it. I purchased this product a while back because I sweat profusely and I loved the idea of a product that actually works better when wet! I thought it would be the perfect sunscreen to wear underneath my makeup on those super hot summer days right? Wrong! 

The product left such an extreme white cast on my face that my foundation no longer matched my skin colour. I am not exaggerating. My skin colour is equivalent to the Rich Cocoa shade in Estée Lauder Double Wear foundation or approx. NW 47 form Mac cosmetics. Also, I want to add that it did not matter how much or how little of this product that I applied to my face. It left a grey film on my skin that could not be rubbed and blended in to my skin on the days that I did not wear makeup and also could not even be concealed by putting my regular foundation overtop! 

I am assuming that this may only be an issue for someone with darker skin tones, however, I would suggest getting a sample and trying it out on your face with and without your foundation overtop *before* investing in this product. 

I gave this product 1 star not because of the quality of the product. On the few instances that I did wear it before eventually giving it away (to my fairer skin toned friend who did not seem to experience the same problem), it did seem to stay on my face (or at least the white cast remained) throughout the day, sweat and humidity.  I am giving 1 star because it is definitely not flattering on all skin tones and is virtually unwearable on my skin tone due to the prmininent white cast.
Title: Women of color beware. Extreme white cast!

Description: The ultimate contouring treatment targeting stubborn fat, especially on the waist, abdomen, hips, arms and knees.
ReviewText: I'm average weighted, no plan to lose weight, but there is a little annoying patch of fat around my belly button and back of my waist.. It's hard to get rid off them, sit-ups don't help. When I bend forward to stretch my body, I could feel that part of my ab hanging loose. After some research, I started using this body shaping cream around belly button and waistline, initially twice a day after showers, following the message instruction. 2-3 weeks later, I notice the loose part is gone, although I didn't see waistline gets smaller, certainly firmer. I then reduced it once a day until I finished the whole bottle. My ab and waist are certainly firmer, but not significantly smaller, that's what I expect. In the summer, I skipped it because of hot days, now I feel ab got loose again. Fall is coming, I plan to start it again.
Title: It's subtle, but works

Description: The ultimate contouring treatment targeting stubborn fat, especially on the waist, abdomen, hips, arms and knees.

This product works miracles! Leaving in Europe until 2 years ago, I was a huge fan of Masvelt creme for numerous years and I was deeply disappointed when It was discontinued in the States. I have tried several similar products of other high end cosmetic brands and they just do not fulfill their promises! Masvelt creme does exactly what it says in a magical effortless way!

Description:
Our most advanced no-fuss formula yet, for a light sunkissed glow in just 1 hour or leave on for up to 3 hours for a deep, dark bronze.

Customize your tan by choosing when to shower:
1 Hour Development = Healthy Glow
2 Hours Development = Golden Bronze
3 Hours Development = Dark Tan
ReviewText:
The price is absolutely worth the amazing quality of this self-tanning mousse. Even though St Tropez's in-shower lotion is cheaper, it's worth splurging the extra $ for the mousse because it lasts 2-3x as long. 

Since the product shows up on your skin as orange (don't worry, it doesn't actually turn your skin orange!), you know exactly where you've applied it already. Unlike lotions, which are notoriously streaky and so difficult to apply evenly, the mousse goes on as a thin, equal layer that is SO natural looking. 

There's no point in me trying any other self-tanners out there, even if they're highly rated. I can't see any self-tanner being better than this one. Highly recommended.
Title: Favourite self-tanner by far

Description:

ReviewText: I've been using St.tropez for years, long before you could buy it locally in a store, and even though I'm always looking out for newest, quickest fake tans this one has always been the best! And once this express mousse came out I've been even happier! I'm naturally an olive skin tone so I can put this on and within a couple of hours I can wash it off or leave it on overnight (same result it just depends on which is more convinient at the time) and I get an amazing, natural, dark tan. It doesn't stink or streak. It's just the beat.

I have size 8.5 ladies' feet (not huge) and I had to cut the toes out to keep them from pinging off of my heels (which is where I am desperate for help).  The full length of my toes is now exposed and they're still just hanging on in the back. I don't think they're any bigger then size 7 at most. Description:
Go ahead and pamper yourself using these soothing gel eye pads.  Portable and easy to take with you anywhere – work, travel or just relaxing at home. Description:
Add customized radiance and a healthy glow to the benefits of your daily skin care products!
Radiance-Plus Golden Glow Booster may be combined with all types of Clarins face care products, allowing you to add a self-tanning effect to the moisturizing, anti-wrinkle and firming benefits of your usual day and night creams.
ReviewText: I have used Radiance Plus for years, but I use to buy it already mixed. Now you have to add 3 drops to my moisturizer, but they don't tell you how much to use or supply a measuring spoon of some sort for the moisturizer. Talk about going backward, I use to just pump it up from a bottle already mixed!! Now I have to guess at how much moisturizer to use with the 3 drops, then mix it together and most times I either have some left over or I don't have enough. We are all so busy nowadays I find this ridicules. I want the look I get from Golden Glow, which was Radiance Plus, so i have no choice but to put up with the inconvenience. Would have given a 5 rating otherwise.

ReviewText: I love these drops. I can use a little or a lot. I no longer have to forgo my regular skin care to self tan, so no more "crocodile self tan skin", which is often the effect with self tanners. NO self tan smell, NO orange overdose. I can't say enough GOOD stuff about this product and I have to admit, I was skeptical before trying it. You DO have to be consistent in using it if you want to keep your color, since it mixes into any skin lotion, that's EASY! I use this on my face too, don't bother getting the small "face formula" bottle of drops, this works just as well.

ReviewText: I'm on the fence about telling others, I was so excited when I found this because when you self tan there is always the dilemma about whether or not to use moisturizer everyday because it sometimes cancels out the last application.I have used 6 drops mixed w/my firming body cream and for 8 days in a row, no tan at all, the only areas were my big tow and around the ankle bone and a spot on each knee (for some reason no amount of exfoliating and scrubbing those areas ever gets rid of those semi-rough spots and I always put a thick cream over those areas so they don't absorb too much but it still doesn't help) I have no idea of what to do, I can't keep it if it is not working, the cost is not affordable if you can't use it!

Title: " CLEVER IDEA "

Description:
Add customized radiance and a healthy glow to the benefits of your daily skin care products!

ReviewText: What a brilliant idea Clarins had with this product which enables you to turn any moisturizer you prefer to use - day cream or night cream - into a self tanner and only for as long as you want it that way. I am quite pale and tend to avoid bronzers and self-tanners as they can look too dark, too orange or just plain fake on me. But Golden Glow Booster is so subtle and the colour develops naturally over time, adding just a touch of sun-kissed glow. When I've reached the level I like, I only need to use this a few times a week (I generally use it at night) to maintain the level of colour and I'm not stuck with a huge jar or bottle of self-tanner. Such an innovative product with great packaging too so you can dispense just the amount suggested.

Title: Must have!

Description:

ReviewText: I was diagnosed with melanoma about 6 years ago so I have been on the self tanner hunt for a long time. I've tried dozens of products - ranging in all sorts of price ranges. So far, this is by far my absolute favorite! I had been looking for a tanner that allowed me to apply it using my own face and body lotion because I wasn't willing to give up that daily regimen, but it doesn't mesh well with self tanners either. This is perfect! I used it in either the morning or the evening depending on what I have time for - and probably use it 3-4 times a week to keep a nice glow. It doesn't the normal self tanner odor - or any odor for that matter - just smells like whatever lotion you partner it with. It's not sticky like others I've used, so if I use it the morning I can get dressed after just a couple of minutes. Also, if I use it at night I don't feel like I'm going to get tanner all over my sheets. It's not going to give you a super dark tan, but most lotion self-tanners don't (at least they don't look natural). It just gives you a nice everyday glow which is awesome for a little self confidence booster!

Title: Best purchase ever

Description:
Add customized radiance and a healthy glow to the benefits of your daily skin care products!
Radiance-Plus Golden Glow Booster may be combined with all types of Clarins face care products, allowing you to add a self-tanning effect to the moisturizing, anti-wrinkle and firming benefits of your usual day and night creams.
ReviewText:
I started my first bottle about a year ago - I used it heavily over the summer, less during the winter, but I still have about of a quarter of the bottle left. It doesn't seem like much, but it lasts! 
As a fair skinned redhead with sensitive skin, I have searched high and low for a reliable self tanner, this is by far my favorite and I see no reason to try any others. I really like how adaptable it is - when starting out, you can use a lot to get an intense color quickly, then use less to maintain. Issues with other self tanners I have NOT found with this one - splotches, smears, weird small dark spots, eneven fading, etc. Overall, this is very user-friendly, natural looking, and actually a pretty good value. 
One thing - I do try to be mindful of the lotion I mix this with. I try to use this mixed with the Jergens body BB cream, with the reasoning that it already contains a little DHA, so it won't have any ingredients that inhibit it. I am concerned that some lotions (such as those with oils, which normally I like) might interfere with the effectiveness of the DHA.  Maybe this is superstition, but I have had good results this way. 
Overall, this costs a lot - but less than the 12 bottles of miscellanious self tanners on my shelf that I haven't used in a year, as they don't work as well as this.
Title: Best self tanner I have ever used

Description: infused with the clean soap and water scent of pure grace, this body lotion hydrates skin, leaving it feeling silky soft and super smooth. enriched with shea butter and natural oils, such as olive and macadamia, this skin-loving formula helps replenish and maintain skin's natural moisture barrier to keep skin soft and hydrated. delicately scented with a crisp, soap and water scent, this perfumed moisturizer will leave you feeling infinitely clean and refreshed.
ReviewText: I LOVE THIS LOTION (THE FRAGRANCE,THE CONSISTENCY, ETC), HOWEVER, IT IS WAY TOO HARD TO USE THE WHOLE BOTTLE. ONCE YOU HAVE USED APPROXIMATELY 3/4 OF THE BOTTLE, YOU CAN NO LONGER PUMP THE LOTION OUT. THE LOTION IS TOO THICK TO POUR INTO ANOTHER BOTTLE. THEREFORE, I USED A BREAD KNIFE TO CUT THE BOTTLE OPEN, I SCRAPED THE LOTION OUT WITH A SPATULA, PUT IT INTO A ZIPLOC BAG, AND THEN SQUEEZED IT INTO MY NEW BOTTLE. i WAS ABLE TO SAVE ABOUT 6 OZ. OF LOTION THAT WAY. A BIT EXTREME, I KNOW, BUT WHEN YOU SPEND THIS MUCH ON LOTION, YOU DON'T WANT TO THROW ANY AWAY. LONG STORY SHORT, I THINK THAT THE TUBE ON THE PUMP NEEDS TO BE LENGTHENED.
Title: Love, but....

ReviewText:
Let me start by saying that I just ADORE the Pure Grace fragrance......it is my ABSOLUTE FAVORITE....I wear it all the time.
I used to read about people saying that the scent is so much lighter than it used to be and it doesn't last long enough, but I had never noticed that before. That is until my current bottle of lotion arrived.
Like I said, I still LOVE Pure Grace. But I SO WISH that the company would LISTEN TO ITS LOYAL CUSTOMERS who still love the scent, but wish that it would last longer, like it used to and like it should. 
Other than that, I have nothing but positives to say. I LOVE the Pure Grace scent and I pray they never discontinue it.

ReviewText:
I'm totally pure grace, it's my fave. i switch out to amazing every now and then because bf likes it better, but this one is all about me. it's lightly and deliciously fragrant--like, people just notice there's a nice scent around me, and often I'm pretty sure they don't even realize it. they just know i'm nice to be around for some reason!

also, My skin tends to be dry and I live in a hot and humid area, so finding a lotion that's not too heavy and not too light is sometimes difficult. I totally love this body lotion for being that perfect balance.

one comment for philosophy.com--the site looks good, but it has always seemed very clunky and slow to me.

i used to love this lotion so much i literally stopped wearing any other fragrances. my expensive perfumes sat, unattended. I did layer, using the shower gel, lotion, and, at times, the spritz. having said that:

Something has changed with either the formula, the scent, or both. it truly is not the same, and it certainly is not better.

it Does not smell good, there is some off chemical smell and it simply has no lasting power.

please, please bring the old formula back. I can't find anything to replace the old pure grace. it was special and i miss it.

ReviewText: I love the clean, fresh fragrance and moisturizing quality of Pure Grace. However, as per previous comments, I also suffered an allergic reaction-specifically to the shower gel which caused a rash on my chest. I was using the body lotion, which I loved, and which I now cannot find anywhere. I switched to Amazing Grace body lotion (which I don't like as much), and suffered an allergic reaction in the form of bumps all over my arms and legs. I am generally not allergic to anything except one remote chemical (can't recall the name), so I very rarely, if ever, have any kind of allergy.

ReviewText: pure grace body lotion is fantastic! i have been diagnosed with keratosis pilaris (kp) - bumps that form on my skin (especially upper arms) and this is the first product i have found that works on my kp - and i have tried many over the counter lotions/creams, and even a prescription lotion! pure grace body lotion has worked the best of all the products i have tried over the years. My bumps are gone! The bonus for me is the wonderful scent of pure grace. this has become my signature scent and i constantly get compliments on how good i smell. i recommend this product to everyone!

ReviewText: pure grace body lotion is the holy grail of body lotions! i have never experienced a body lotion like this in my life! the lotion itself is exquisite. it is rich, soft and gentle, all in one lotion. not only is the lotion perfect, it leaves you with perfect skin. your skin is never, ever greasy, sticky or oily with this. pure grace body lotion leaves your skin incredibly moisturized, tender, and voluptuous. it gently kisses your skin with the intoxicating, fresh, clean scent of pure grace. this is my favorite body lotion from philosophy and i have them all. i just keep reaching for this over and over again. it is the most perfect lotion ever made. thank you philosophy for this lotion and for my divine skin!

ReviewText: When I first got this product, I loved it because the smell was great and it left my skin smooth without a greasy feel. The only problem was I started to break out on the inner part of my arms and even then I wasn't completely sure it was from the lotion or maybe something else. My daughter decided to try the lotion and she broke out with horrible hives on her arms and even a little on her face, so obvioulsy she had a severe allergic reaction to the lotion and now I suspect I am also allergic, but not as severely allergic as my daughter is. This is a very nice product for some people, but buyer beware since it is not for everyone, so I would highly suggest doing a patch test if you decide to purchase this product.

ReviewText: The body lotion is a great product for layering, it really maximizes the longevity of the scent. it is moisturizing but soaks in well and never leaves me feeling slick or greasy. pure grace is my everyday, go-to scent - i start with the shower cream, shampoo, and conditioner and follow with the body spritz, body lotion, and finally the edp on my pulse points. my routine keeps me smelling fresh and clean all day, but the fragrance is never heavy or overpowering. pure grace also blends beautifully with other scents, I especially like to layer it with falling in love.

ReviewText: over time this just grew to be way over-powering for me. i don't know why everyone says "soap" and water clean, because it's never smelled that way to me. i have been a fan of falling in love, and have since moved on to inner grace, which seems to be the most fragrant. but, for some reason, the more i used this, the stronger it smelled to me... until i just couldn't take it any longer. a lot of people love this, and i always think that choosing a grace is a personal choice. i say start with a smaller bottle to be sure. one thing is clear with this product: you will absolutely love it, or you will think it is too strong, like me. the quality of the lotion is there... so, that is a given. and, the scent is not a bad one either... just too strong.
Title: i like it... but,

ReviewText: Sadly, this is my least favorite philosophy scent. I know it has a huge following, but it's obviously not for everyone. I received a 4oz bottle in a fragrance set, & I don't find myself wanting to use it very often. I personally think the only time I would welcome using it is on a day I couldn't shower or felt less than clean. It would help me smell like I was soap & water clean. It really isn't a bad smell. it is not offensive - in fact It smells good when it is on other people, it's just not a scent I personally like to smell on me.
Title: smells like soap

ReviewText: I probably use this scented lotion more than any of my others. I usually put in on at bed time and my little chihuahua usually sleeps with me at night and guess he gets the scent on him to because my hubby told me this morning that Chico smelled real good. can't beat that , that it makes me smell and feel good plus makes my dog smell good to. what a deal! this is just a very clean scent plus it moisturizes my skin so well. I can always smell it on my skin the rest of the day , and that is just using the lotion.
Title: very moisturizing

Description: infused with the clean soap and water scent of pure grace, this body lotion hydrates skin, leaving it feeling silky soft and super smooth. enriched with shea butter and natural oils, such as olive and macadamia, this skin-loving formula helps replenish and maintain skin's natural moisture barrier to keep skin soft and hydrated. delicately scented with a crisp, soap and water scent, this perfumed moisturizer will leave you feeling infinitely clean and refreshed.
ReviewText: Wow, this lotion is amazing! i was hesitant to try it for some time because i prefer the emulsions to the lotion. i have found that the emulsions are thicker and richer and absorb better than the lotions. but this lotion is the same consistency as the emulsions and absorbs as quickly and leaves my skin just as hydrated. the scent is so light and clean smelling (it doesn't have that twang the body butters and hand cream have) and it is my favorite winter scent. it is just so clean and crisp, like the air is this time of year, and just leaves a very subtle soapy smell on your skin. and the best part is it mixes very well with any of the philosophy spray fragrances because it's just a clean base. my favorite to mix with it is falling in love or amazing grace, but they all go nicely.

ReviewText: I love this lotion every since i have started using these products my skin has never been sooo soft, moisturized and has never looked better!!! i love pg! i am new to philosophy and i have been very pleased with the results!!! i haven't used anything else since i have been using pg. i am definitely hooked! i've been trying to sample all of the scents and pg is the one i've been using the most! I have also noticed i can wear other perfume with this and it only makes it smell better. i love this lotion!

ReviewText: i love, love, love this lotion so much. it's made my skin so soft, even my hands and feet. i love the pure grace scent too. when i first opened it i thought it was a little too "perfumey." i had never worn perfume before, only sweet or fruity body sprays so i wasn't used to the more sophisticated scent. needless to say it took all of about two uses to get me hooked. i want to try unconditional love next, but i don't want to give up my pure grace. i might have to get both and alternate instead.

ReviewText: I love to use this with the shower gel and perfume that matches. but i also like to use it when i've used another product because it doesn't "compete" with other fragrances, it complements them. everything i have has a fragrance of some sort and it's nice when i just want to put some lotion on my hands to have something that won't compete or mix with my other fragrance and smell funky. this makes my skin feel soft and smooth without making it feel greasy. great product and great fragrance!

ReviewText: i just keep trying your grace fragrances and fall in love with each and every one of them. first ag (which is my signature scent); then ig (which is absolutely peaceful & beautiful); and now pg which is incredible! Title: ultimate clean

ReviewText: I love philosphy's body lotions. they hydrate the skin so well and the perfect compliment to the body wash. pure grace is a lovely fragrance. I hate to even label it as a fragrance because it just leaves a nice clean scent. it's not floral at all. nor is it citrus or woody. it's just plain old fashioned soap and water clean. it's fresh, crisp and airy. think of clean sheets. the pure grace body lotion is must for layering. I love it. i feel so clean and energetic when i use this.

Title: SIlky skin~!

ReviewText:
this lotion is a great base for any perfume, but of course is also great for layering pure grace as well!

it's so crisp, clean, and fresh that you will feel as if you just stepped out of the shower all day long. I always reapply whenever I need a pick me up - even though the scent lasts such a long time! i can smell it up until I take my next shower.

It's so subtle though that everyone will think it's your soap or just how you naturally smell! this is great to wear alone if you work in a place that doesn't allow strong perfumes, or if you or anyone you know is allergic to perfumes. a light, soft lotion that will make you smell amazing but not overpowering is the perfect thing! and that's pure grace :)

it's also perfect for hydrating and moisturizing. makes my skin so smooth and soft, and my skin tone is even and some bumps i get on my thighs go away within hours after applying. will never use any other lotion other than philosophy!

Description: infused with the clean soap and water scent of pure grace, this body lotion hydrates skin, leaving it feeling silky soft and super smooth. enriched with shea butter and natural oils, such as olive and macadamia, this skin-loving formula helps replenish and maintain skin's natural moisture barrier to keep skin soft and hydrated. delicately scented with a crisp, soap and water scent, this perfumed moisturizer will leave you feeling infinitely clean and refreshed.
ReviewText: I keep reading how many of the fragrances are changing now that Coty has purchased Philosophy. I am so sad to say today that it is absolutely true. I've had the Pure Grace perfumed body lotion before and received a new bottle today. It is NOT the same fragrance at all. It is very different than the "old" Pure Grace. To me Pure Grace used to be too strong, clean, fresh, heavy on leafy greens. While I liked it, I could only wear it in small doses or it would give me a headache. This new/changed Pure Grace is lighter and smells closer to laundry detergent. Honestly, I may actually like it more, but am disappointed that a company would come in and change such well known & loved fragrances without offering the originals & not own up to it and notify loyal customers of their changes. I am not happy with the Amazing Grace changes at all, but think this new formula of Pure Grace is more pleasant and doesn't give me a headache. It smells more clean/soapy and less like leafy greens.

ReviewText: I adore this lotion. it is my go to moisturizer. the pure grace fragrance is lovely and lingers nicely, and this lotion is never sticky. the dry down is absolutely delicious. when i first bought this, i used it only on special occasions because it felt so. . . well. . . special and made me feel so pretty. now i use it every day so i can enjoy it. i have purchased this in the 4 oz and 8 oz bottles and i have never had an unpleasant problem with the scent fading away before all the lotion in the bottle is gone. the 4 oz is the perfect size for my purse. also, i love the way i feel when i use this. . . i feel pampered, cared for and beautiful. on the flip side, occasionally this lotion is a little too luxurious for me, especially on casual days when i just want to wear jeans and a t-shirt. on those days, i just mix in a little water and apply as usual. this way, i don't get all the richness i usually experience (which is what i want) and it feels more like a basic, everyday lotion. i will continue to buy this. i am 100% totally satisfied with this product!

Title: Get compliments on the smell

Description: infused with the clean soap and water scent of pure grace, this body lotion hydrates skin, leaving it feeling silky soft and super smooth. enriched with shea butter and natural oils, such as olive and macadamia, this skin-loving formula helps replenish and maintain skin's natural moisture barrier to keep skin soft and hydrated. delicately scented with a crisp, soap and water scent, this perfumed moisturizer will leave you feeling infinitely clean and refreshed.
ReviewText:
The thing that I always loved about the pure grace lotion was the wonderful clean scent that lasts all day.

I usually buy the 16 oz from my local Macy's and it had been a few months since I bough a new bottle, but with summer coming I simply had to have more as it is the perfect light clean summer scent and compliments my summer perfume wonderfully. I ordered the extra large size. I figured it would be a bargain since it was my favorite lotion anyway and I used it all the time.

I am afraid that i have made a mistake.
The first bottle I ordered was completely off in smell. it had this horrible chemical smell that I found disgusting. I called and customer service was wonderful and sent me a new bottle with expedited shipping.

It is better, but not the same great scent that I remember. it definitely doesn't last as long. It still has a very slight chemical smell that dissipates once applied to my skin, but i don't get the 6 to 8 hours of fragrance i used to get. It fades very quickly now. Please please please return to the previous formula. I won't return it. It's still a good lotion with a nice scent and customer service was so good to send me a new bottle without making me jump through hoops, but I really don't love it the way I used to. Shame I spent 50 bucks on lotion I simply don't love.
Title: Definitely not the same great scent

Description: Bath Retreat® Hair Turban Is A Unique Product That Can Be Used On Wet Or Dry Hair. All You Have To Do Is Slip It Over Your Head And Around Hair, Twist And Loop! Its Tapered And Lightweight Design Ensures That It Stays In Place And Fits All Head And Shape Sizes.Care Instructions: Hand Or Machine Wash In Lukewarm Water On Gentle Cycle. Do Not Bleach, Do Not Iron, Do Not Dry Clean, Do Not Tumble Dry, Hang To Dry Only.
ReviewText: Cuter than your average shower cap, perfect for your bathbomb snapchats! Dead-simple to use. I use it when my hair is wet too, although I wish it was just a tiny bit bigger as I have very long hair. Does the job and the price is unbeatable. Instantly makes you feel pampered!
Title: Super cute super easy

Description: Deliciously soft and fabulously fresh, this everyday body milk instantly helps the skin recover its smooth and beautiful appearance.
ReviewText: I am a 60 yr old male. My g/f got me started on Biotherm and I love it. 2 month's ago my g/f and I went to visit my 2 adult daughters and my ex-wife. Last month my youngest daughter and her fiancee came to the Bay Area to visit me. My daughter told me "I'm not supposed to tell you this but mom told me to find out what you're using on your skin because you have no wrinkles and look amazing for 60". As the title states "it doesn't get any better". I use Biotherm Blue Therapy (lift and blur) in the mornings after shower and the Lait Corporel Body Milk at bedtime. Best thing about this product : if I forget to apply for a day or 2 my skin stays silky soft.
Title: it doesn't get any better

Description: Deliciously soft and fabulously fresh, this everyday body milk instantly helps the skin recover its smooth and beautiful appearance.
ReviewText: Given that Biotherm is no longer available easily in dept. stores in the U.S., I had been moving away from using it because I didn't like having to order online and wait for delivery... However, I simply can't find any other moisturizer that works as well on my sensitive, itchy skin, so I'm back to placing orders. I love the citrusy scent (but also love that the scent dissipates rapidly) and the way it just absorbs easily into the skin and provides relief and softness.
Title: Best & most effective moisturizer I've found for sensitive skin

Description: Deliciously soft and fabulously fresh, this everyday body milk instantly helps the skin recover its smooth and beautiful appearance.
ReviewText: This is my first review here and this excellent moisturizer has inspired me to write one. The quality of my skin after using this is just perfection. I've always admired those people whose skin looks so smooth from head to foot even if they spend a lot of time outdoors, and I wondered how to get that look. I've tried many moisturizers but this one finally did it. Your skin will glow, will look and feel velvety and silky smooth, and the light orange scent is pleasant. It goes on smoothly with no oiliness or tackiness. You will want to show off your arms and legs. And if you have a lovely tan or naturally dark skin, then prepare for even more compliments. I have since decided to buy the matching shower milk and scrub when I was spending time on the Côte d'Azur in the hot sun and the combo set kept my skin glowing. Biotherm is great!
Title: Perfect skin

Description: Deliciously soft and fabulously fresh, this everyday body milk instantly helps the skin recover its smooth and beautiful appearance.
ReviewText: I first starting using this product in 1979 when I bought it in Germany and have used it ever since. Even had it shipped to Canada before I could get it here. It is the best lotion on the market. It absorbs into the skin leaving it soft and hydrated without the greasy/ oily feeling with the lovely scent of citrus. It also helps keep the mosquitos away in the summer. Love this product and as well as the Eau Vitaminee body lotion! Won't use anything else.

Description: A feather-light sunscreen for daily use. Provides exceptional hydration to help protect against external aggressors such as dryness and air pollution for beautiful skin, healthy-looking skin. InviIBUKIle on skin. Can be used as a makeup base for a beautiful foundation finish. Easily removes with daily cleanser.
ReviewText: LOVE! I received this for free in my voxbox courtesy of Influenster. It says it's a face and body cream however, I only use it on my face and use a regular sunscreen on the rest of my body. I have a light to medium skin tone and tend to tan well and not get burnt very often. But, I thought this UV protection cream does a great job! It's not oily at all which is key for a face cream, especially since I have combination skin and anything too oily will cause me to breakout. I've worn it on it's own and underneath makeup, it looks the same as any other cream under makeup, doesn't break up my foundation or anything! All of my makeup looks great still. Highly recommend!
Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE

Description: A feather-light sunscreen for daily use. ReviewText: This is one of the best sun screen there is. No one likes the oilly texture of sun screen and this one does not left you with oilly skin. Really light weight. Easy to blend and not leaving you a white face. The only thing may stopping one from getting it is the price.

ReviewText: This product is simply amazing. I have dry, sensitive, skin, wear full make-up every day, and have been instructed to wear a high spf factor sunscreen every day by my dermatologist.  Most sunscreens make me either break out, dry my skin out, or affect the way my makeup applies and wears. No worries at all here. Shiseido's Urban Environment keeps my skin hydrated. It's not just non-irritating, it soothes the skin, and it works. Very happy to have this as a permanent part of my skin care routine. I also use this on my hands and décolleté.

Product Name: Sunscreen Care Milk-Lotion Spray SPF 50 Plus
Description: The effectiveness of Clarins Multi-Cellular Protection: the skin's natural defences are reinforced and skin is protected from premature ageing.
ReviewText: I recently took this product with me on a winter Caribbean vacation. This is the best sunscreen I have ever used. We snorkeled every day, spent many hours on the beach, in and out of the water, and no sunburn. Most sunscreens, especially SPF50, are thick and heavy, but not this one! This is light and gives great protection while letting the skin breathe. I have lupus, so sunscreen is a must, and I have found a new favorite! This one is the best, and I will definitely purchase again.
Title: Best Sun Protection

Product Name: Sunscreen Care Milk-Lotion Spray SPF 50 Plus
Description: The effectiveness of Clarins Multi-Cellular Protection: the skin's natural defences are reinforced and skin is protected from premature ageing.
ReviewText: This has become my all time favorite sunscreen. It's super light weight, easy to apply and doesn't leave a residue on my skin. I have super sensitive skin, so I have a tough time finding anything that won't cause a rash and will protect my skin. This does both! I have never gotten burned while using this product, which is amazing because I have light skin that easily burns. I do add a little more around the sun targeted areas (e.g.: shoulders, neck, chest/neck) as though tend to burn the most on me. I end up purchasing one bottle every few months to ensure I have plenty of stock. One bottle will last me almost the entire summer season. I use this along with the one specifically for the face, which I also love. The one for the face doesn't burn my sensitive eyes and provides excellent coverage in pairing with this one.
Title: My go to anytime of year!

Product Name: Sunscreen Care Milk-Lotion Spray SPF 50 Plus
Description: The effectiveness of Clarins Multi-Cellular Protection: the skin's natural defences are reinforced and skin is protected from premature ageing.
ReviewText: I bought this to protect my skin from the harmful rays to go out on the boat this past weekend. It is amazing! After one use, I've decided that THIS IS IT FOR SUN PROTECTION for me forever! It sprays on like a lotion and melts into your skin and does not stay thick or greasy on top of your skin. I am very fair and I did not need to worry about getting burned with using this! In fact, I still got a tan but absolutely no redness! I wish everyone was aware of how harmful the sun can be and how wearing a good SPF can still give you a nice tan. My husband was also very impressed by this Sunscreen Care Milk-Lotion Spray SPF 50+. He also thought it was wonderful and worth buying again. That says a LOT! I also use the SPF 50 for my face daily and that is not oily or greasy either and works very well for my oily skin. That is what made me decide to try this spray for my body and am so glad that I did! Thanks for such wonderful products, Clarins!
Title: Love this non-greasy sun protection!

Description: Formulated with naturally sourced ingredients, it is our 1st paraben free and aluminium free deodorant certified by ECOCERT. This formula is entirely composed of deodorising ingredients of natural origin for 24-hour odor protection.
ReviewText: I've been using this deodorant for over five years now and have seen this product increase in price over the years.  It really does protect my clothes against odor.  It is not antiperspirant of course so I still sweat, but at least I'm protected against the smell!  I love the fact that it's "ECO CERT" which makes me feel safe wearing it every day.  The smell is citrus-y but not overly strong.  My only complaint is that it does go on wet and requires a bit of drying time, but otherwise a product that's part of my daily routine.  It lasts about 6 months of every day use (and has a shelf life of 12 months once opened).
Title: Best natural, safe deodorant!

ReviewText: I love all of Philosophy's 3 in one shampoo/shower gel/bubble baths, but the french vanilla bean one is my favourite scent. It doesn't have the artificial vanilla scent that you find in other low end bath products. It smells like real vanilla bean and is not overpoweringly sweet! ReviewText: I'm usually very picky with vanilla scents and I'm afraid this wasn't a favorite. I will still use this scent and enjoy it; however, I wasn't expecting the slight butterscotch candy note that I'm getting. This won't be a repurchase but I did like it enough to not return it. I would probably suggest Cinnamon Buns if you're looking for a creamy, vanilla foodie scent.
Title: Nice scent

ReviewText: My Son, he's in his 20's and uses this constantly. Won't use anything else so I buy this for him ALL the time! He's always loved Vanilla scents but more than the scent, the way this works on his skin is what he LOVES!!! I use all of the 3 in 1 bath products (and many Philosophy products) too and LOVE LOVE LOVE Philosophy!!! This is GREAT for sensitive skin.
Title: Great Scent, Son LOVES THIS!!!

It's not that hard to come across a body wash or shower gel that smells amazing, but it is pretty difficult to find one that both smells amazing and lasts a long time. Philosophy is obviously a brand that pumps out some seriously high quality products, so I knew this would be stellar, but I am seriously impressed with the smell and lasting power. In love.

ReviewText: I like this cleanser overall. It has helped with my pores. The first week I did break out more, but it improved quickly. I dont think that this would suit sensitive skin- the fragrance is extremely strong. It also is quite masculine. My face smells for quite some time afterwards. I think I will be trying abother brand afterwards, because the smell is that strong. If it didn't smell like it I would like it 100 tines better.

Description: Find Your Moment. Pure. Exquisite. Uncomplicated. Elizabeth Arden White Tea is inspired by the simple pleasure that accompanies the first sip of tea. Exquisitely uncomplicated, this new fragrance invites you to revel in the moment. A musky-woody floral, it preludes with sparkling Italian Mandarin and sensual Sea Breeze Accord. Its Zen-like heart of White Tea Extract and Mate Absolute Paraguay steeps in graceful femininity while Madras Wood, Ambrette Seed Absolute and a Trio of Tranquility Musks lead to a harmonious finale. For the woman who wants to immerse herself in the moment. White Tea is a crisp, blissful new addition to the Elizabeth Arden fragrance portfolio. The perfect escape for your senses, it is an invitation to indulge in warm memories and delight in the white tea vapors, blue skies and cotton-like clouds.
ReviewText: I love the way white tea smells, very subtle and not over whelming and it blends well with my lotion, body wash and perfume.
Title: fragrance

Description: Just 3 minutes as part of your daily regime. A convenient way to build a sun-kissed, gradual glow, that provides up to 24 hour moisturization.
ReviewText: This product is SO easy! It's very gradual but with regular use you build and maintain nice colour. I love that there's no aweful smell, and it's easy to add 3 minutes to your morning routine. I found that showering, then stepping out of the shower, PATTING my legs with a towel so they are wet but not dripping, then applying the tanner worked best for me. Jump back in the shower 3 minutes later to rinse. I am very fair and found this colour really nice - not orange at all. I'm definitely a convert!
Title: gradual, convenient, streak-free. LOVE

Description: Just 3 minutes as part of your daily regime. A convenient way to build a sun-kissed, gradual glow, that provides up to 24 hour moisturization.
ReviewText:
I'm not using self-tanners a lot, just occasionally if I want to get that extra healthy-glowy look, since naturally I'm REALLY pale. That's another reason why I don't use self-tanners a lot, btw – the majority of them is just too dark for me.
This one is very sheer, gradual and gives a nice golden glow to the skin. It is also very easy to use. However, I still get streaks from it sometimes – but probably it's not the products fault, just my lack of practice) Another downside – I still feel the smell of it on me after I use it, although it is much lighter compared to other self-tanners I used
Title: Best I've Tried – Still Not Perfect

Description: Just 3 minutes as part of your daily regime. A convenient way to build a sun-kissed, gradual glow, that provides up to 24 hour moisturization.
ReviewText:
I've used both this and the mousse from St Tropaz's line of self-tanners, and even though I prefer the mousse, the in-shower gel isn't bad either. What you'll notice is a very subtle glow, which is buildable each time you apply the lotion in the shower.

I didn't like how my skin was basically back to normal after about two days, but if you're looking for a temporary, natural-looking tan for an event or weekend getaway or something, you should strongly consider this product. It smells good, too - doesn't leave you smelling like you obviously applied self-tanner.
Title: Does what it claims to do.

ReviewText: I picked this up after we came back from our holiday, over a year ago.. I use an SPF 50 so I had very little color. After using this, my skin looked radiant, and with no harmful rays. I highly recommend it. As I use it in the shower, I also put on a hair mask .

Product Name: melon daiquiri shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: happy hour favourite, melon daiquiri, is a refreshing bath treat. philosophy's shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath cleanses and conditions skin and hair.
ReviewText: I am very particular with scents, so when I purchased this and sniffed it for the first time, I was in love with the melon scent right away. As for the effectiveness of the product itself, it lathered well, and the staying power of the scent was decent- not too long nor too short. Definitely on the pricier side for bath and shower though, so this is a splurge!
Title: Smells absolutely delicious

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: as others have said, there is a slight lemony after note to this one, but the main scent is warm, very sweet, vanilla, and feels exactly like a cookie fresh from the oven with soft frosting. the only thing you'll find missing is the sprinkles! i bought this and was very surprised as to how relaxed i felt after using it, so now this sits in my summer shower rotation as "relax" and next to the "energizing" blue raspberry. my husband dislikes the scent, but this one is one that doesn't linger, so again, this scent is perfect! i am considering buying another just in case this disappears like so many of my favorites!
Title: Surprisingly relaxing scent!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText:
pink frosted animal cracker is becoming one of my favorite philosophy "bakery note" shower gels. i just find this scent hypnotizing...the warm comforting smell of fresh baked cookies balanced with a tarte lemon scent that literally makes me crave cookies. it smells too good, i don't want to get out of the bathtub with this one!

it's a nice strong scent that doesn't get lost in a bathtub full of water, when used as a shower gel the scent is even stronger. it is a thick creamy opague formula, rich and moisturizing.

i can't believe they didn't make a body lotion for this scent...we need one! please keep this scent in the permanent inventory and supersize it (i need the 32 oz size!).
Title: one of the very best "bakery" scents

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: smells extremely similar to the previous frosted animal cracker (if not exactly the same) but coloured pink this time around. i don't get any of the pink notes, its just that super delicious scent of faintly lemon kissed sweet biscuit-y goodness. the formula is same, very rich, thick and creamy. if you are like me and have an obscene hoard from last year, you wont need to get this one, but is a good opportunity to stock up if you missed the boat last year. they really need to bring out a matching lotion already, its not like its a secret how much we all love this scent.
Title: deja vu- frosted animal cracker #2

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: pink frosted animal cracker.. i just love that name lol it makes me smile when I use this... the scent is remarkably similar to the pink frosted layer cake scent that was discontinued a couple years ago... there were a few other pink frosted varieties and they are all pretty much the same but all very good, warm, sweet, vanilla-y type scents... plus the pink looks so cute in your shower that you will just jump in and get happy even when it's a dreary day outside... if you are looking for one for the kids, this is perfect... my son loves the 3 in 1's cuz they get very bubbly in his bath as they also work as not only shower gel, but also bubble bath, and shampoo... they are not drying to the skin, and keep his baby skin so soft!
Title: Pink frosted layer cake's little sister

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: i was excited to see this shower gel come out - i bought the original frosted animal cracker for a friend, and by the time i got around to trying it, it was sold out. this smells exactly like you opened a bag of frosted animal crackers - sweet, delicious, and with a tiny hint of lemon for that authentic animal cracker scent. the pink color is an added bonus, although, and this is so creamy and moisturizing in the shower. once again, philosophy has managed to re-create a delicious scent perfectly :)
Title: smells just like a frosted animal cracker!!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: this one really smells like the animal crackers it's named for! i can smell the baked cookie scent, mild lemon with sweet frosting on top. when i first tried this, i had to buy a bag of animal crackers when i went to the store because this shower gel made me crave them. i love to use this one for shampoo because i can smell the scent in my hair throughout the day and it smells sooo wonderful!!! i just love the bakery scents so much and philosophy does them so well.
Title: smells like fun!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: the scent is creamy lemon. for anyone who may steer clear of the foodie scents you should give this a try! I adore Philosophy, but my personal likes are not to choose the sweet food scents to wash.....this is very refreshing and comforting. i find pink frosted animal cracker to be lux and comforting all at the same time. the bubbles and moisture which envelop you in the shower/bath is what makes this line stand out from the rest. i was so happy to see the return of a frosted animal cracker - but I was equally happy that the scent was basically identical, just with a little pink! i have 3 bottles of the original and I will be stock piling this one just in case it does not stick around. Philosophy, please consider a lotion in this scent. it has quite a following and would make an absolutely decadent and yummy all over mosturizer. Lotion - Please!
Title: lotion please!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText:
I really love this scent - it's very true to the smell of frosted animal crackers you can buy at the store. I just wish I could smell it on me after the shower. Even still, smelling this body wash makes me enjoy showers so much more and it lasts a long time.

It's pretty decent as a shampoo, but after a few weeks of use, I felt like my hair was a little too greasy so I switched back to my regular stuff. Great as a body wash though.
Title: Smells like frosting!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText: Heavenly is about the only world I can come up with to describe a shower gel that smells exactly like those tasty little crackers we all love so much. Sweet, sugary, buttery, crispy cookie goodness drenched in a sweet, creamy coating is exactly what you will find in this bottle. When a philosophy shower gel makes me crave the treat it's named for , I know it's a winner. Perfect for gift giving, too!
Title: Beyond yum

Please philosophy bring us a delicious pink frosted animal cracker body lotion, philosophy girls are asking!!!

this to me smells exactly like the original "frosted animal cracker". Sweet and lemony. side by side with my eyes closed, I'm not sure If i could tell the difference.

i'm definitely going to add a few bottles to my "gift closet" to have on hand for summer birthdays!!

Title: OMG! amazing, found my new favorite!

Title: Frosting!

ReviewText: i'm totally addicted to this scent and can't get enough of it! it's definitely one of the best bakery scented shower gels philosophy has come out with in a long time and it smells exactly like an animal cookie.... lemony, buttery and delicious. Yum! highly recommend!
Title: dreamy!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText:
It was hard deciding what scent to select but this is a new one and it is wonderful. I was with a group of friends of both guys and the girls:
the girls struggles between animal cracker and cinnamon buns..but chose animal cracker in the end. The guys, however, loved animal cracker as top w/ no hesitation.
It lathers really well and the scent is buttery, sweet and soft...not overpowering. Its a nice difference for those of you who have grown bored with vanilla frosting and cake scents but still like the baked goods appeal.
And the scent lingers! I use this as my 2nd wash when washing my hair. Its not too moisturizing in general but I dont use it as a cleanser but for the scent. I use my own personal choice of shampoo first and then a quick slick over the top of hair and rinse and my hair smells edible all day long. the bf LOVES it.
I bought mine at the commissary for a bit cheaper than the norm, but I'd totally pay full price for this again. It last for a very long time as a little goes a long way! Good job philosophy!
Title: So yummy!!

Product Name: pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description: sweeten your shower with pink frosted animal cracker shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath. this circus animal cookie-inspired shower gel provides a rich, foaming lather to cleanse and condition skin and hair. the moisturizing formula leaves skin and hair feeling super soft, while the delicious, pink frosted cookie scent brings fun indulgence to your shower or bath.
ReviewText:
thank you philosophy, you really outdid yourself - pink frosted animal cracker is just as good, if not better than last year's original frosted animal cracker!

it smells just like the original frosted animal cracker ... open up a bottle of the new "pink" cracker and you are immediately treated to the mouthwatering scent of lemony, frosted, crispy baked cookies ... it's just like a having bag of the mothers circus animal cookies in my shower - utterly delicious!

the scent is very strong, not weak at all, and it really does linger on my hands even after i'm out of the shower.

i was madly in love with the original frosted animal cracker last year, and was sad to be down to the last bottle. so i can't tell you how pleased i was to see the new "pink" addition this year! this time i stocked up so i won't have to worry about running out any time too soon ;-)

the formula is just as rich and creamy as it could ever be, so my skin still feels soft and hydrated, no matter how long i stay in the shower using this product.

you know, i have to agree with the other reviewers ... the only thing that could make it better would be a matching lotion or even a matching body spritz, hint hint!
Title: just like mothers circus animal cookies!!

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion
Description: amazing grace perfumed, firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin. a beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: What did you do to the scent in your products? Its not there anymore. I have used Philosophy products for the last 8 years. I love the amazing grace scent exclusively. I use all the bath and body products and all the skin care products. I always order the 32 oz. size so it lasts longer. The last two times I refilled my order I noticed the scent seems much weaker to not there at all. I always received so many compliments on how wonderful I smelled and have recommended your products to many people. If my next order still does not have the usual fragrance I will no longer order them. Please put the fragrance back. Its the only scent I love.
Title: All philosophy products with amazing grace scent

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion
Description: amazing grace perfumed, firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin. a beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I have been wearing Amazing Grace for over 10 years - I wore the lotion everyday. I got compliments all the time and the scent lasted all day. I just finished up my last bottle of lotion which I had purchased a while ago so I bought a new one. When I put it on I thought it smelled a little different, then throughout the day, it smelled so different I thought that I had bought the wrong Grace lotion! I went home to check and I DID buy the right Grace but Philosophy has undoubtedly changed the fragrance..so I am very disappointed - hopefully enough people complain and they change it back to what it was! :-( Now I have to find a new scent
Title: Disappointed

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion
Description: amazing grace perfumed, firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin. a beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: i never ask what someone is wearing but while visiting a friend I couldn't resist asking. amazing grace! she sent me home with a sample pack and i made my purchase. after receiving my order, one day while at the office i overheard a co-worker ask another, "what is that smell?" I had just put some on and had a little desk fan blowing. when i turned and had her smell my hands she kept saying, "it's amazing" before reading the name of the scent! she made a large purchase of amazing grace products and the compliments keep coming for all of us. it's not offensive at the office and it's funny to see others linger around when wearing this. you'll love it too!
Title: Love amazing grace

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion
Description: amazing grace perfumed, firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin. a beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: i love this fragrance and imagine my disappointment when I used my new bottle of amazing grace firming body emulsion and i could smell nothing...i even held it close to my nose. the bottle had changed and i guess philosophy thought that it might change the scent as well. what a sad day. my signature fragrance is no more. i will not pay good money for what i can get at a grocery store for a whole lot less. this company, which once used to be my favorite is no longer. i used to use everything and now all i use is the purity and the amazing grace body spritz. those have not changed so far, but i am afraid that those will change as well. i am really sad!!!!
Title: So sad! :(

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion
Description: amazing grace perfumed, firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin. a beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I have struggled with dry, itchy skin for most of my adult life, especially during the winter months. I live in Boston so the winters can be very harsh on my skin. I generally get nervous using products that are scented because I am afraid it will make the itchiness worse...well not with this lotion! I've been using this lotion for a few weeks and I don't want to be without it. The formula the lotion is so rich and deeply hydrating. However, it is never greasy! It leaves my skin lightly scented with the amazing grace fragrance. I will use this as long as philosophy makes it. I received a free product for the purpose of my review. Opinions are 100% my own.
Title: Love This Lotion!

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion
Description: amazing grace perfumed, firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin. a beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: Philosophy's Amazing Grace firming body emulsion is amazing! The name fits this perfectly. It it an amazing product that has a graceful scent that lingers with you. Feminine scent that makes you feel and smell clean, pretty and has a calming effect. My skin is so soft after applying this. I use it each morning and every night. When I apply this, I do not have to apply perfume. This smells so good that I wouldn't want to mask the scent. I am hooked on this after receiving a free sample to get my opinion. I am ordering more so I can make sure I don't run out. I am also ordering a few additional bottles, to give as gifts this year.
Title: I Am Now Hooked!

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion
Description: amazing grace perfumed, firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin. a beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I have been using this body emulsion for years and I don't think that I will ever stop. It has become my scent, the one my friends and family recognize and constantly compliment on. Not only does it make my skin feel soft and firm but its scent is phenomenal. I started using this product in college when I worked as a waitress. I would get compliments by patrons constantly and those compliments would come all day, even at the end of working a double I could go out with friends and not feel like I smelt like mexican food! I have never found anything that even comes close to keeping me as soft and smelling good as this stuff! it is definately worth every penny!
Title: amazing perfectly describes this product!

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion
Description: amazing grace perfumed, firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin. a beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText: I am not a skin lotion gal. i exfoliate, i use facial moisturizer, but i've never been one for lotion for my hands/legs, etc. this product may make me a convert! it smells nice, it soothes and softens, and tightens a little, but it doesn't feel heavy or greasy at all. my boyfriend even sneaks it sometimes and puts it on his feet, ha ha, i will make a philosophy user out of him someday, he's already stealing my body wash! ladies, this is a great product and if you don't like the scent of amazing grace, have no fear, it also appears to come in some of the other popular scents, so there's got to be one to suit your fancy.
Title: great for hands!

Title: this has been a favorite for years!

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion

ReviewText: I have had issues with dry itchy skin for years. I finally broke down and went to a dermatologist because I couldn't stand the itchiness anymore. The Dr. told me to stop using heavily scented body wash/soap and lotions because the heavy perfumes were part of the reason for my dryness. Although I have several different bath and body products in my bathroom, I decided to exclusively use the Philosophy line. My skin has improved so much with the amazing grace emulsion and body wash. It leaves a clean, pretty scent without irritating my skin or being too perfumey. My favorite Grace combo is putting on my Amazing Grace emulsion and then using my Inner Grace spray fragrance on top...it's just great!
Title: Firming Emulsion is Great for Dry Skin

ReviewText: i wear amazing grace fragrance on a daily basis. i have oily skin and fragrance doesn't last long on me. i need to layer fragrance in order for it to last. this moisturizer is perfect for layering your fragrance. I apply it after i shower with the buffering wash. it 's moisturizing and absorbs quickly. it's not a thick cream (try ag body butter if you prefer a thicker cream) and spreads evenly. i didn't notice firmer skin and its the only complaint i have about the lotion. it does leave smooth, softer skin, and evens out my tone. i do receive the frequent question"what are wearing, it smells great?" I usually receive more compliments when i apply amg lotion before wearing the perfume. perfect for the winter and fall.

ReviewText: i love the philosophy emulsions so much. i was never able to use body lotion before these because everything felt too heavy and would make my clothes stick to me all day. these lotions absorb lightening fast, so i can smooth it on and get dressed immediately and my skin just feels soft and smells good. i find the emulsions to be thicker and they absorb easier. as far as the scent, ag is pretty hard to beat. it's so light, clean, pretty, and soft. if you asked me what my favorite scent is, i would tell you fil or eg, but i find that i actually use ag the most and it is the one i keep coming back to. it just makes you feel so good. and there are few things that can compare to using ag in the shower and following with this. mmmm.

Title: Why..why....why??!

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion

ReviewText:
i began using this product early last year and love it. aside from the amazing (pardon the pun) fragrance that everyone compliments hours later, the lotion doesn't just disappear after you've rubbed it on...don't get me wrong, though, it takes very little, it isn't heavy, and it isn't greasy at all.

i put the lotion on at 7am and went to a physical therapist at 11:30 that morning; he couldn't get any of his pens to write on my knee, apparently, because the moisture was still so commanding!

i also noticed considerable moisture, a lack of peeling, and a quick return from red after a moderate sunburn...not that I would recommend getting one of those to test the product but it was a second testimonial for my belief in the product!!

I did knock a star off just because the scent really isn't for me, too 'perfumey' for me. I did enjoy the results though.

ReviewText:
the perfumed firming body emulsion in amazing grace is one of my absolute must-have products. I use this every single day. I always have been a lotion girl, because my skin is naturally dry and becomes very uncomfortably dry in the winter. My skin is also very sensitive, so sometimes I am weary about some scented products because they contain other chemicals that may further irritate the skin.
i can't say enough great things about this product. It absorbs into my skin so very nicely, leaving it feeling smooth and moisturized, never ever sticky or greasy. it also doesn't smother your skin, which a lot of other lotions or emulsions do, not allowing your skin to breath. this emulsion does the exact opposite, perfecT! plus, amazing grace is my favorite philosophy scent and the emulsion is a part of my fragrance layering routine.
this product really is a must-have!

ReviewText:
Hello,

I remember the first time i "noticed" the amzing grace scent on one of my clients. I asked her what her perfume was. she kept telling me that she did not wear perfume. i am a real estate agent and when we closed on her new home she sent me a thank you along with a bottle of the amazing grace firming lotion. the secret was out and i have been a fan ever since! I love the product however the language on the bottle is so dark and depressing regarding aging. please reconsider how you word the remarks on the bottle. i have sent the product to my sisters who are in their 40's and 50's and they agree. it makes us feel ancient and hopeless regarding the aging process. i think you need to revise the language and make it a "promise" that by using it we will feel younger!!! It is my favorite scent and i will continue to buy it however as for now i cover the bottle with bright blank paper! :)

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion
Description: amazing grace perfumed, firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin. a beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
this is another one of those products I got a long time ago and took a while to review it. I'm finally through my bottle of this (need to order more) product and there are pros and cons. The pros: the scent is wonderful and it lingers. it is a great layering product with the bath products and the spray fragrance and it really carries the spray fragrance during the day. this is also a great night moisturizer and the scent is so calming that in my opinion it even helps me sleep. :) the emulsion gives you soft, touchable skin, and really helps with some of the problem areas like hands and elbows and shoulders with great mositure.

the cons: well, only one con. I really didn't see any "firming" impact on my legs or stomach or arms. i'm not sure what kind of effect this was supposed to have, and I'm not *that* flabby, lol, but I was just curious as to what it was supposed to do firming wise. maybe I need to buy and try it again. :)
