i dont know about the firming and antiaging properties of this stuff. im sure its good for your skin, and thats a plus, but i just lovvveee the way it feels and smells :)
it is the most relaxing pretty scent ever!! the scent of the lotion lasts on your skinn all day long!! its also very calming. i like to rub it on my arms during the day, and throughout the day i stop and sniff my arm and smile :) i like to rub it all over, after a shower, before bed - and when i wake up in the morning i can still smell the beautiful scent on my skin and my skin feels so soft.
its a great moisturizer because it softens like a cream, but soaks in like a lotion. i have dryer skin, so the fact that this moisturizes enough to leave my skin soft is great.
this really is a unique texture, and scent. i have given this as a gift to my mother-in-law, (who is not as crazy about body&skincare products as i am lol) and she loved it :) i would definately recommend!

After about and hour I don't know, everything I put on seems to vanish, but let me just say, I put this lotion on my skin, went out in 90 degree weather, did some shopping, came home decided to clean my patio and wash my pillows in which I got wet from my hands all the way up my arms, cleaned the bathroom, made supper and by 12 am I was still smelling this lotion on my skin. Can you say AMAZED!!!! I am sold!!!! I probably will just stick to this lotion and the shower get because nothing else in this line stays on my skin for more than an hour. Last year i started to notice there really is not much amazing grace smell to it anymore. I thought i had just become to used to the smell and could not smell it anymore. I tried stop using it for a few months and tried using it again, and still not a good smell. so, I waited for another delivery as I was on auto delivery, and the same no good smell. It is also no longer the same rich lotion it once was either!!!! i started to check out reviews, and found it was not just me!!! it is your product!!! It is not good anymore!! what have you done to it??? i am so disappointed!!! naturally i have cancelled all auto deliveries of this and pure grace, the same problem seems to be happening with it, my second favorite lotion. ReviewText: the body emulsion is the icing on the cake in your layering experience... so lux, so creamy, so softening... even if you dont order the EDP or the spray fragrance... you must try the body emulsion... you may find that it is all you need on days you dont want to wear spray fragrance... it also wears well with the other graces... amazing grace is clean, soft, warm, and delicate... for so many years i had been unable to tolerate most fragrances due to severe allergies... amazing grace is in one word, ahmazin... this is the softest, most delicate, feminine fragrance... there is no other on the market place that comes close to amazing grace... there is just something about it that brings a calmness to my soul... when i wear amazing i wear it for me... i dont wear it for anyone else but me... i feel like i "look" better when i wear it... is that possible? it just makes you feel feminine and classy... my shower is the only me time that i get and i look forward to it every day and sometimes twice a day if i need to destress... amazing grace embraces you with comfort and care... it is never overpowering, never obnoxious, never obvious... understated yet noticeable... warm but not musky... girly but not prissy... innocent but not juvenile... mature but not old... whenever i wear it i just keep smelling my arm all day just to get a sniff... its mahvelous dahling!

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion
Description: amazing grace perfumed, firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin. a beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
I have to tell you about a product that I am reviewing for Smiley360.com. It is Amazing Grace by Philosophy. I tried the Firming Body Emulsion and the Shampoo, Bath & Shower Gel. First off, as a member of Smiley360.com I was able to get samples of this item in exchange for voicing my opinion. What a deal!

Okay, so first off, the fragrance of the products are wonderful. They are not overpowering, but have a nice, clean floral scent. It is a scent that is perfect to encompass you from head to toe.

Next, the product is not greasy and leaves your hair and skin, clean and fresh. Your skin feels soft and smooth.

The firming body emulsion leaves your skin soft, hydrated and doesn't irritate. I have both sensitive and dry skin and must be very careful of the products that I put on my face and body, as many products burn my skin or make they very itchy and red. This is not the case for the Amazing Grace firming body emulsion. A little goes a long way and it relieves my poor skin.
I like to use it on my face and my arms and legs. They feel absolutely silky after use of the Amazing Grace.

The Amazing Grace shampoo, bath and shower gel is ingenious. Why have multiple scents in your hair and body? Why pay for multiple products? You can use this all in one and come out with clean hair and a clean body and be consistent with your scent. The scent is fresh and clean and offers just enough femininity.

I am so glad that I was offered the chance to try out these products. This will definitely be a staple in my home now.
Title: Wow-I think I found a new staple for my home

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion
Description: amazing grace perfumed, firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin. a beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
the amazing grace LOTION IS A MUST-HAVE for me! i LAYER IT with the amazing grace SHOWER GEL and fragrance AND IT CREATES A WONDERFUL SCENT AND FEELING THAT TAKES ME THROUGHOUT THE DAY.

THE LOTION has the same fresh, clean floral notes as the fragrance, with the extra luxury of BEING ONE OF THE BEST MOISTURIZERS OUT THERE. IT GOES ON EASILY, ABSORBS AND DRIES QUICKLY AND DOESN'T LEAVE YOU FEELING STICKY. IT REALLY LASTS A LONG TIME, AND HELPS TO KEEP ME FROM FEELING ITCHY (I HAVE VERY DRY SKIN TO BEGIN WITH, SO THIS IS A BIG DEAL FOR ME!). MY SKIN FEELS SO SOFT AND MOISTURIZED WHENEVER I USE IT, AND I JUST FEEL HAPPY WHEN I SMELL THE FRAGRANCE ON ME!

THIS IS THE ONE SCENTED LOTION THAT i GO TO WHen i am not in the mood for anything else.

ALONG WITH THE AMAZING GRACE SHOWER GEL, This LOTION HAS A REGULAR PLACE IN MY TRAVEL BAG. i collect the mini bottles of the amazing grace shower gels and lotions so i can take them with me when i travel. THE SCENT OF AMAZING GRACE keeps me grounded and feeling calm when the stress of traveling can sometimes get to you.

AS I HAVE STATED IN ANOTHER REVIEW, there is just something so wonderful about the amazing grace fragrance .. it makes you feel clean and fresh, soft and feminine, and happy all at the same time! every time i wear it, it never fails to elicit a complement from friends and strangers. it is soft enough not to overpower the senses of others around you, yet just enough that people standing or sitting close to you can notice it. when i layer this scent, i get a lot more hugs from my friends!
Title: A mUST HAVE LOTION!!

Product Name: amazing grace perfumed firming body emulsion
Description: amazing grace perfumed, firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin. a beautifully feminine scent of welcoming bergamot to greet the senses, irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk with its classic beauty.
ReviewText:
I have used this product and multiple products across the Philosophy brand daily for many years and had almost daily compliments. But here is what I've learned after reading up on a couple of issues.

This product, and most others in the Philosophy line contain parabens. These are not good things to put on your body and let absorb into your system. The shampoo contains sulphates (good for making suds) and will strip the bejebbers out of your hair color. Please take the time to look them up. Philosophy was purchased by Coty in 2010. That's when I started to notice a difference in formulas across the line. Also, in contrast to Philosophy's "give to charity" stance, their published policies regarding animal testing and "cruelty free" status seem wobbly as noted in this press release...30 Dec 2013: Philosophy now states that "before we place a product on the market, we assess it thoroughly to ensure that it is safe for human use and for the environment and that it is compliant with all applicable laws, rules and regulations. we do not perform, nor do we ever commission any third parties on our behalf to perform, animal testing on our products or ingredients."

I find this to be very carefully worded. I cannot locate any information other than this carefully worded press release that indicates that Coty/Philosophy products are not, at some point (not just the finished product) tested on animals. Philosophy is likely NOT cruelty-free. I welcome Philosophy or Coty to contact me to prove conclusively otherwise and make definitive public statements stating such that can be corroborated by recognized animal welfare advocate groups.
Title: Loved For Many Years But...

Product Name: Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Mineral Sunscreen Lotion for Body
Description: Gentle 100% mineral sunscreen is incredibly comfortable, even for sensitive skins. Lightweight formula glides on easily, absorbs quickly for non-irritating broad spectrum defense. Invisible Shield Technology forms a protective veil that's virtually invisible on all skin tones. Oil-free.
ReviewText:
Has anyone else noticed that Clinique never posts their ingredients online? No one thinks that's suspicious? They say they are a sensitive skincare company, yet half of their formulas haven't changed from the 1980's. One of their primary ingredients is mineral oil, a leftover substance after producing petroleum jelly, that has been linked to cancer.
And this product doesn't even have the circle around the UVA, meaning the Canadian government hasn't certified it to protect you against as much UVA rays as UVB.
All I'm saying is, I'd like to see the ingredients and the research behind this stuff when I buy it. That type of information should be readily available.
Title: Where's the ingredients list?

ReviewText: I am so happy with this product! My face never seems to get tanned in the summer time so I needed a product to give it a natural looking glow without looking orange. This face lotion drys quick, is perfect under makeup and instantly bronzes! (And most importantly, looks natural!)
Title: Amazing natural glow!

Description: Specially designed for the delicate skin on your face, this lotion cleverly combines St.Tropez Self Tan with skin care benefits.
ReviewText: I have been using St. Tropez products for over a year and really have enjoyed them all. I tried the face lotion as I was too afraid to put the tanning mousse on my face. It didn't give as dark of a tan as the mousse does to the rest of my body and I did find that with my oily skin, the product liked to sit on top of the oil instead of soaking into the skin.  I would recommend if you don't have oily skin.
Title: A little oily

Description: Specially designed for the delicate skin on your face, this lotion cleverly combines St.Tropez Self Tan with skin care benefits.
ReviewText: The only tan I got from this product was while I had the lotion on over night as I slept. Once I washed it off in the morning all was gone and after several days of using it still nothing. Actually went back to check if it was a temporary tan to wear under makeup. I  reluctant to try any other products despite the reviews but I'll give it one more go.
Title: Didn't create any tan

Description: Specially designed for the delicate skin on your face, this lotion cleverly combines St.Tropez Self Tan with skin care benefits.
ReviewText: I've been using the St. Tropez tanning mousse (the original, gradual tan, and dark) for years and it is the best self tanner I've ever used.  I bought this face cream thinking it would be the same quality as the mousse - wrong.  It bronzes SLIGHTLY when you first put it on but if you put on any makeup on top of it it will disappear.  Throughout the day it will disappear as well. It doesn't create a tan whatsoever.  So I just use the mousse on my face even though it isn't recommended.
Title: Doesn't Work

Product Name: DayWear Advanced Multi-Protection Anti-Oxidant & UV Defense SPF 50
Description:
Your daily defense. So sheer. So powerful. This powerful UV protector helps defend your skin to keep it looking younger, longer.
Advanced Broad Spectrum SPF 50 sunscreen helps skin resist the first signs of aging.
Sheer, lightweight formula goes over any moisturizer. Leaves skin soft, smooth and comfortable.
ReviewText: I have mature (50 yrs) skin but I have been very oily most of my life.  Now I find that Canadian winters are impacting my skin quite severely so I had to find 'something' to protect it.  I researched products, ingredients, reviews and with no limit on cost I was determined to find the right solution.  Every road led to Estee's Daywear, and it was worth every effort and penny.  It has an impressive list of ingredients, the right blend and PH, and it's fragrance free.  Since the sun is the single most powerful influence on the signs of aging, a minimum of SPF 30 was a requirement.  Daywear has an SPF of 50!  Even better!  It can be worn alone or under makeup and I use it right up to my lower eyelids.  It never bothers my skin or my eyes and I know that I'm doing something good for my complexion.  Do your own research, but I don't think you will find a bettter product for the winter months and the price point is great.  It will always have a place in my skin care regime.
Title: Will not face the day without it!

Description: Experience the ultimate indulgence, infused with green tea for a clean, fresh feeling.
ReviewText: I bought this yesterday online.  There wasn't a full description of ingredients from the retailer (London Drugs). Unfortunately, it is an anti-perspirant, NOT a deodorant. It has aluminum chlorohydrate  in it.  Dispenser doesn't work -  it says to turn the base then apply.  Well, I turned the base 100 times, but no product ever came out.  I smashed it with a hammer to scoop out 2 tablespoons of product out, which is now in a jar.  They should re-label this a product as a anti-perspirant, and just put it in a small tube or jar.  Not worth $15.  Will never buy again.
Title: dispenser doesn't work, this is an anti-perspirant

I'd also like to see a Green Tea talcum powder, just as there's a Blue Grass powder -another lovely scent.

this is very good sunscreen with  glow effect. not much coverage. so you should have good quality skin as a beginning. as the weather is getting hot, it melts in your skin but also gives less coverage but still not really shiny.

it is perfect for normal to dry already without problem skin.

ReviewText: I enjoy that this tinted sunscreen is OIL-FREE. It doesn't feel greasy on my skin and gives me a nice glow! My mom originally started using this product and I have swiped it from her bathroom and use it religiously in the summer!!

Description: The most luxurious tan yet by St. Tropez, for the ultimate natural-looking, luminous glow that lasts for days. This Brazilian-inspired indulgent dry oil is suitable for all skin tones with a quick-drying formula that is clinically proven to moisturise for up to 7 days.
ReviewText: Gives a nice sun kissed glow with just one application.  The colour is neither orange or green.  This product applies like a dream, non- streaking and you can use your hands or a mitt to apply.. Non oily texture, it sinks into your skin and is moisturizing.  It leaves your skin feeling soft and supple with a very slight, delicate, fine gold sparkle. Fantastic on fair skin too.

ReviewText: I rid my hair of silicone and now have really soft, shiny beautiful hair.   So I thought I would do the same with body products.   Although hard to find, I did notice Korres did not include silicone in its products.  I am loving my skin.  Non-drying (silicone is very drying) lotions will now be my choice and Korres is wonderful.   P.S.  I  love the scent.

Description: Huile Prodigieuse is France's leading beauty oil*. This multi-usage dry oil nourishes, repairs and softens skin and hair. It has a unique, non-greasy feel and a captivating fragrance.
ReviewText: I have used this oil for about 3 years now as a body oil, love the scent. One of the products I always repurchase when I run out. I love the scent of it, not for my face though.

Description: ANTI-DRYNESS PROTECTION. The formula contains hydrating agents that work for 8 full hours. The sensorial, moisturizing texture is easy to apply and the delicate fragrance combines the scent of fresh, cool water with light citrus notes, leaving the skin subtly summer-scented. Non-sticky and non-greasy, the formula melts softly onto the skin. SUN-KISSED HYDRATION. Skin maintains its sun-kissed glow even longer thanks to the Ultra-Fluid Body Milk's moisturizing properties. For her, for him - this universal milk is suited to every holiday and skin care need.
ReviewText: I loved the pre-2013 product from a few years ago but I will never buy this one again. I am throwing out the bottle, not even 1/2 used.

Description: Soothing oil-free makeup instantly colour-corrects flushing, blushing. Calming ingredients help minimize flare-ups. Beneficial probiotic technology helps strengthen skin's barrier. Keeps environmental triggers at bay with SPF plus antioxidants. New packaging is being phased in for this product. Your shipped product might look slightly different than the one shown on this site. Allergy test. 100% fragrance free.
ReviewText: I've been using this product for awhile. I only use it as my winter foundation (I find it doesn't hold up well in summer conditions) I find it moisturizing and its buildiable coverage. It really does help with redness!! The one thing I do find (primer or not) is it does not have great staying power unfortunately. I have to lightly reapply every 4 hrs. But besides that and if your looking for a redness solution it gets the job done.
Title: Redness be gone!

ReviewText: Beautiful fragrance that lasts all day and velvety smooth feel!
Title: Angel body lotion

Description:
It’s all about being a beach beauty before you hit the sand. A new complete face and body treatment, self-tanning and moisturizing for 24 hours* in the heart of a rich and creamy texture. For a tanned, moisturized, and perfumed skin to make summer last all year!
*Based on an instrumental study on 12 women.
ReviewText:
Not happy with the new product!
I've used self tanning "milk" since 1997, which for whatever miraculous reason would produce a tan on me that perfectly matched a tan I'd get from the sun. So natural! Loved it. No other product ever came close to Clarin's self tanning milk!!! I'd apply in early evening, and, yes, there was a smell. But my next shower took care of that, and the color would last 5-6 days. I never wanted a product for my face. As for this new milky lotion, the color is different,, and it's not deep enough (who wants to reapply to "deepen" it- time-consuming and using up the product quicker $$$) 
The "improvements"- moisturizing, suitable for face and the smell of figs-are fine, but they have replaced a longer lasting natural color and SPF. Please tell me self-tanning milk will still be available for purchase. :-(
Title: Clarins self-tanning milk vs.milky lotion vs.

Description:
It’s all about being a beach beauty before you hit the sand. A new complete face and body treatment, self-tanning and moisturizing for 24 hours* in the heart of a rich and creamy texture. For a tanned, moisturized, and perfumed skin to make summer last all year!
*Based on an instrumental study on 12 women.
ReviewText: This is reminiscent of the Jergens Natural Glow product. It's okay, but not worth the price and comes with that gross leftover smell. It was a fine moisturizer, but definitely left brown residue around my fingers. I'd go elsewhere for a body tanner.

Product Name: Sunscreen Control Cream for Face SPF 50 Plus
Description: High protection for the face protects skin from the appearance of wrinkles and sun-induced age spots. This lightweight comfortable cream ensures an even, long-lasting tan.
ReviewText: I was looking for a sunscreen to use over my eye cream. The Clarins counter was giving samples of this away. I've never used any Clarins products,always,Lancome, Estee Lauder, or Clinique. WOW!! It takes only a tiny amount for upper lid to browbone,under eye/crowsfeet area. Plus it's actually moisturizing,leaves no white film,no smell, not irritating! I ride/work with horses a lot,and I can use this in sunlight even without my eyecream first, and it's like a nice "light cream! I work lots in the HOT Texas summers, and this stays put! Plus when I read all about Clarins natural plant ingredients,history,etc. I'm switching to their face & eye creams now! Thank you Clarins!
Title: Fantastic in every way!

Product Name: Sunscreen Control Cream for Face SPF 50 Plus
Description: High protection for the face protects skin from the appearance of wrinkles and sun-induced age spots. This lightweight comfortable cream ensures an even, long-lasting tan.
ReviewText:
I am not a fan of eye wrinkle creams because I have very dry eyes and often the product/scent will dry my eyes even more. This however is an excellent product , it keeps the under eye skin, soft and smooth without drying or irritation!
The other products in this series are equally outstanding. Again i do not tolerate sunscreens because of the stinging sensation I get from them, but again these products are soft, smooth and perfect for sensitive skin. I am an outdoor girl, gardening, bike riding, beach and all through the heat of the summer my skin stays well nourished, soft and moisturized with irritation!
Title: Sunscreen for eyes

Product Name: Sunscreen Control Cream for Face SPF 50 Plus
Description: High protection for the face protects skin from the appearance of wrinkles and sun-induced age spots. This lightweight comfortable cream ensures an even, long-lasting tan.
ReviewText: What I like best about this sunscreen is that it doesn't leave my face greasy like other high SPF products. When first applied I do initially look a little shiny, but this shininess goes away in about a half hour. I do not wear any powders or foundation on my face; so the shininess truly does diminish on my combination skin. It does not clog my pores or sting like other products have. This product also works well with the Bright Plus HP Serum. I received the serum as a sample and thought it was o.k., but after using it with this sunscreen, I can say the serum works great and goes to work quickly!
Title: Unlike the Others

Product Name: Sunscreen Control Cream for Face SPF 50 Plus
Description: High protection for the face protects skin from the appearance of wrinkles and sun-induced age spots. This lightweight comfortable cream ensures an even, long-lasting tan.
ReviewText:
I bought this for my vacation in February and have practically used it every day as part of my morning routine.  
I recently packed this in my husbands work bag as he was working outside in the hot sun every day for the past few weeks and was very impressed with how long it last and how well it works.  He used it on his arms and also the back of his next and no sun burn or stickiness.  

This product blends in nicely and is not goopy or sticky  and has a very faint but pleasant scent.  I just love and will defiantly be repurchasing when in need of replenishment.
Title: BEST SUNSCREEN FOR FACE EVER!!!

Product Name: Sunscreen Control Cream for Face SPF 50 Plus
Description: High protection for the face protects skin from the appearance of wrinkles and sun-induced age spots. This lightweight comfortable cream ensures an even, long-lasting tan.
ReviewText: I thought they had stoped making this ,and am greatly relieved ! My skin is fair and sensitive, while I can always find this product in Austria where I live most of the year; it seems harder to find in the states. I will be purchasing a few tubes. Good eye creme with a sunblock - mineral- is very hard to find, and at 42 years of age I have just started to see light wrinkles on the sides of my eyes. It is the first place they show up, so we better protect it. Beware many companies have eye cremes with SPF, yet they are chemical ingredients. I do not use them on my body or face, why would anyone think it a good idea to put these in an eye treatment ? Purchase this one, it is a nice light day version with anti-oxidants as well, and concealor works just fine with it.
Title: Wonderful

Product Name: Sunscreen Control Cream for Face SPF 50 Plus
Description: High protection for the face protects skin from the appearance of wrinkles and sun-induced age spots. This lightweight comfortable cream ensures an even, long-lasting tan.
ReviewText: I use the whole sun product face and body line from Clarins. I was very happy when Clarins came out with a non-oily, and non-whitening 50 spf face cream. At first, I loved this product, but after two weeks of daily use, it really dried out my skin;especially the lip area. I tried the face cream a second time two months later, and the same result happened. It is definately different than their usual sun creams. It also has a different scent.
Title: Not what I expected from Clarins

ReviewText:
Her skin looked smoother, tighter and had less puckering. She had been losing some weight after making a healthy change in her lifestyle so she didn't have incredible amounts of cellulite to reduce but without her telling me she was actually using the cream I saw the results with my own eyes.

I recommend it to all my clients as with today's busy woman sometimes we skip a day or two in our regimens but the cream's results are maintained for up to 28 days after you stop the usage so it's great.

Description: Repair and protect your dry skin from external aggressions. Harsh winter winds, damaging sun rays and electric heating strip moisture from the skin leaving it rough and dehydrated.
ReviewText: This product is a super light body butter. I would call it a mousse rather than a butter. You do not need very much and works fantastic on dry skin. In winter my calves and shins get very dry and itchy, but when I use a small amount in the mornings, I have no itching all day long. Leaves skin feeling silky smooth. Absolutely non-oily. The fragrance is not my favourite. It contains citrus oils and makes the product smell a bit like a dish washing detergent. Having said that, it is not an over powering smell, and soon wears off. Will buy again and again.
Title: Excellent product

Description: Repair and protect your dry skin from external aggressions. Harsh winter winds, damaging sun rays and electric heating strip moisture from the skin leaving it rough and dehydrated.
ReviewText:
I rarely review a product unless it is exceptional.
This product is EXCEPTIONAL.
Fully absorbs into your skin to soften and feeds your skin thoroughly - it's a truly wonderful moisturizer.
Leaves no oily residue - not a heavy butter - light to apply - your skin continues to feel softer and moist throughout the day.

Also, has done wonders for finger nail texture and quality!
Has increased the quality and texture of Nail surface, Cuticles and Hands to remain moist and soft - I use it before bedtime and in the mornings after showering - wonderful stuff.

Description: For a natural, sunkissed glow, our newly formulated, Medium/Dark body lotion is ultra-hydrating and gradually builds to create a classic, healthy looking tan to suit all skintones.
ReviewText: I bought this product a year ago.  I have very light skin and wanted a naturnal tan with out laying in the sun.  My sister told me about St. Tropez and how much she loves it. Well I now love it. It is so easy to apply. No streaking. Coats evenly.  I have applied it to all parts of my body.  Its  gives you a beautiful tan.  I have put it on a half an hour before bed and I wake up with a bronze tan. I have applied it to my leggs in the morning before work and in no time they are tanned. This product gives me confedence. I have talked a few of my friends into trying mine and they now purchas it themselves. I hope it is available for ever. Everyone should try this product. You will get hooked on it.
Title: Incredible feel good product.

Description: For a natural, sunkissed glow, our newly formulated, Medium/Dark body lotion is ultra-hydrating and gradually builds to create a classic, healthy looking tan to suit all skintones.
ReviewText: I bought this for the first time about three weeks ago. I had tried gradual tanning lotions years back and the lotion was always too orange for my skin, even using it once. I expected better from St.Tropez as my spa recommended the product. I used it and it's a fantastic moisturizer. It is not as orangy as other self tanners I've tried in the past and I can use it two or three times and get a nice tan on my pale skin. To get more even coverage, I recommend using regular body lotion with it in your knees, feet, or anywhere product might build up. My coverage isn't perfect but it's better. A bit expensive for what it actually is. Doesn't last too long either.
Title: Wonderful Gradual Tanning Lotion

Description: For a natural, sunkissed glow, our newly formulated, Medium/Dark body lotion is ultra-hydrating and gradually builds to create a classic, healthy looking tan to suit all skintones.
ReviewText: I bought this to tan my arms for a wedding and it worked perfectly! A natural gradual colour with no streaking and quite hydrating. Very happy with it. Didn't give it 5 stars because has a fairly strong perfume like scent which made me sneeze.
Title: Natural colour!

Description: Pamper yourself with the timeless elegance of Blue Grass for a fresh and clean feeling.
ReviewText: I've been using Blue Grass Cream Deodorant for over 30 years and have always been very pleased and satisfied. I used to purchase it at department stores, but the last few years have been ordering online. My last shipment of 5 contained one faulty tube that would not provide applications by turning. The bottom of the tube was separated from the main part of the tube and the only way to get an application was to push. This resulted in spurts of too much product. This caused a lot of waste and was very frustrating. I hope the order I'm placing now will be inspected to be sure this doesn't happen again.
Title: Problem with last shipment

Description: Pamper yourself with the timeless elegance of Blue Grass for a fresh and clean feeling.
ReviewText:
I am so happy that I found this (and the other green tea scent also). I don't think I would have ever tried these had it not been for reading the back label. This should say somewhere on the front that this is an antiperspirant. It's not just a deodorant; there is a big difference.
Especially these days when everyone wants to go 'natural' there are many deodorants on the market that are just that. But then there's people like me who need to keep/stay dry in the summer. I will continue to purchase now that I know :)

ReviewText: I have fair skin & I can't say enough about this sunscreen oil, its amazing! I spent 2 months in Mexico in the sun and I didn't burn or get pink at all when i used it, and I have used other sunscreens in the past and would burn. I would apply it once before going outside and maybe again 2 hours later if I was still in the sun just in case. Some times I would forget to apply it and still no burn, I was impressed. It nourished my skin leaving it soft and moisturized and i loved the natural smell. I got a great tan even using the 30, this will defiantly be my go to sunscreen from now on, for me its totally worth the price. Its priceless!

This Clarins oil smells great (kind of smell that instantly reminds you of tropical vacation), feels like heaven on the skin and doesn't clog my pores at all ( i use it on my face also, and pretty much ANY oil usually breaks me out, but this doesn't). Actually, I also use this on my hair and I feel that it helps soften and nourish my hair after sun& seawater. 
Sun protection is decent, just don't forget to reapply at least every 2-3 hours if continually exposed to the sun.

Title: Absolutely love this!

Description:
This exceptional colourless, dry oil with no oily or sticky feel, leaves an irresistible soft, satin finish on the skin.
The ultra-fine oil spreads evenly through the hair without weighing it down.
ReviewText:
Every sunscreen I have ever tried on my face, no matter how well-formulated for sensitive skin, causes severe reactions from my skin, including bumps, acne, and sores. I cannot impress upon you enough just how gentle and reparative this sun screen is to my skin. Nyamplung, or better known as tamanu oil, is an extremely reparative oil. Much like aloe vera, nyamplung or tamanu oil is reparative to the skin, and can be used to treat cuts, scrapes, rashes, and a number of other skin conditions. Unsurprisingly, these benefits also apply to my adult acne! I had been trying oil-free sunscreens for about two weeks before trying this oil-based sunscreen instead. My skin had little irritations all over. I used this oil before going for my daily run, and when I washed it off later in the afternoon, my skin's irritations had all but completely healed! I was so alarmed.

This oil is very nourishing. I am so glad your company doesn't mix the formula with multiple oils. It's so great to be able to use a sunscreen with just one oil. There are other oil-based sunscreens on the market that include argan and coconut oils, which, however moisturizing and nourishing, can be severely acne-inducing on more oily or combination skin such as my own. The balance of linoleic to oleic fatty acids in tamanu oil is such that it does not clog already oily pores. Grape seed oil is also ideal for acne prone skin, because of its high linoleic to oleic acid ratio. This is the only oil-based sunscreen on the market that I can use, because the other brands use acne-inducing oils (coconut, argan, etc.,) in their formulas. Please don't ever add any other oils to the formula! This is so perfect just the way it is. It is SO ideal for sensitive skin. It is the only sunscreen in the world that I can wear, please don't ever take it away or change the formula!

Additionally, the oil blends in very well on my face and leaves me with a golden, sun-bathed glow. I apply this every day now after showering or cleansing my face. It moisturizes, hydrates, heals, does everything it should, without causing any acne on my skin. It should also be mentioned that this product works VERY well as a sunscreen. As a red-head, I burn (especially on my nose) very easily. With every other sunscreen I tried this summer, my nose always came back bright red, even when I re-applied! THIS Sunscreen, however, keeps my nose untarnished from the suns rays, and I do not burn at all. As a sport sunscreen it is also effective. Because it is an oil, it is hard to remove! It is very sweat-resistant and works very well on my runs in the hot summer weather.

Thank you so very much for selling this product. Perhaps one day you will start a whole line of oil-based sunscreens!!! It's such a miracle product!!!
Title: Cures acne! Best sunscreen EVER

Description: This luxurious perfumed talc is infused with Yardley London’s English Lavender fragrance, which subtly combines fresh, light, calming english lavender with notes of geranium, chamomile and eucalyptus. ReviewText:
This is such a classic brand and the English Lavender Talc brings me nostalgia of when I began to wear this as an older girl when life was simple and fresh.  I wear it still in the summer for the added fresh feeling.  The talc is a super fine, high quality silky talc.

The scent is simple but multi-layered due to the other scent ingredients added to the lavender, which gives it a bit of sophistication.

Description: This easy to use, no-streaks face and body lotion glides on to give you an instant natural looking golden tan that lasts for up to 24 hours. Combined with water and transfer resistant Rainmac Technology, your colour will not streak or transfer onto clothing, making it ideal for an instant fix or a no-commitment one night tan.
ReviewText:
I bought this product to use for a night out, and disclaimer: the product is really small for the price, I feel like I used a lot of it just in one night.

The medium/dark gave me a nice colour, didn't make me green or orange. I applied the product with the tanning mitt so it wasn't streaky.

Product easily washes off with soap and water. 

I recommend after you exfoliate in the shower to moisturize, let it dry and then apply this product. The product itself does not moisturize your skin and I noticed that I had dry flakes on my legs after shaving. When I applied moisturizer on top of the product after a few hours it did rub off a little bit, but did not make it patchy.

Throughout the night I noticed that it rubbed off on my foot where my sandal strap was and made it look like dirt. Also the product transferred a little on my beige dress.

Overall the product was good, did what it needed to do but I will most likely not buy it again.
Title: Nice tan, but transfers a little bit

ReviewText: I used this prior to leg and arm waxing to exfoliate my skin and I was curious to try a salt scrub instead of a sugar scrub. I felt it was much more gentle than most sugar scrubs I have tried, which is great for sensitive skin, but I wanted something a little more agressive to prep my skin at the time. I still use it every few days or when my skin needs a pick me up. I love the scent of this one and it smells very nice all day. I don't even need to wear perfume when I use it. It's nice for a gentle scrub but if you're looking for something more intense I would recommend a different scrub.

Title: Your skin will love it

Description: Indulge in philosophy's most-loved fresh cream scent as you moisturize skin with fresh cream body lotion. the moisturizing formula contains macadamia seed and olive fruit oils, shea butter and antioxidants to help hydrate, soothe and soften skin. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly to leave skin feeling silky soft and super smooth, while the fresh cream scent lightly scents skin and leaves you feeling wrapped in comfort.
ReviewText: I purchased this last year based on the reviews, and absolutely loved it. It was more of a cream scent (think real whipping cream) with a bit of sweetness. It was magical. I should have paid more attention to it being advertised as "new" this year. This isn't the same. Last year's lotion was light yellow and thick. I opened this tube and it's thin and white. Also, the smell is a lot different. It smells like any generic vanilla-scented cream you could purchase at any major retailer. Shipping costs will be too much to send it back, so I'll probably see if one of my daughters or friends want it. I'm disappointed Philosophy changed the formula. I'm glad I still have a little in my tube from last year!
Title: Not the same...

Description: Indulge in philosophy's most-loved fresh cream scent as you moisturize skin with fresh cream body lotion. the moisturizing formula contains macadamia seed and olive fruit oils, shea butter and antioxidants to help hydrate, soothe and soften skin. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly to leave skin feeling silky soft and super smooth, while the fresh cream scent lightly scents skin and leaves you feeling wrapped in comfort.
ReviewText: I just purchased and received this for the first time, figuring I would like it....and I was blown away with how much I absolutely LOVE it!!! I love that philosophy made a food/desert type fragrance so we can enjoy them all day, not just the few minutes we use them in the shower! I just can't even put into words how good this scent is but I can't imagine anyone not liking it, and I am picky about fragrance. I have a hard time liking anything not made by philosophy because of the chemical smells that come with most fragrances, but again philosophy did not disappoint.
Title: So in love!

Description: Indulge in philosophy's most-loved fresh cream scent as you moisturize skin with fresh cream body lotion. the moisturizing formula contains macadamia seed and olive fruit oils, shea butter and antioxidants to help hydrate, soothe and soften skin. ReviewText: This is my ultimate favorite product in the whole world. I have tried many other lotions from so many other different companies and spent so much money trying to find the right creamy vanilla scent I craved. All that money was wasted because I never found what I was looking for until now! I can finally say this is the BEST vanilla-cream scent EVER. This lotion deserves an award . It has long staying power and scent clings to my clothes which I love. I use this after shower gel and scrub (which I got from an online company), then use the spray fragrance to layer and my hubby can't keep his hands off of me. Makes my skin so soft too. My sisters try to look for my hidden stash whenever they are over but not sharing this until there is bulk sizes available! =)
Title: Would buy in bulk

The lightweight formula absorbs quickly to leave skin feeling silky soft and super smooth, while the fresh cream scent lightly scents skin and leaves you feeling wrapped in comfort.
ReviewText: Im not a big fan of food smells as it is usually too heavy and can give me a headache, however just got this in the mail, and i think the scent is just enough of the fresh whipped cream vibe, I will be able to use along with even mixing with my other Philosophy lotions and creams, like even with the Lemon Custard. Now that I am imagining a big slice of fresh lemon merengue pie with FRESH CREAM on top, I think that should give you an idea of whether I like it or not. Don't have to think very hard. You will be trilled I'm sure.
Title: Another superb moisturizing treat for your skin!!

Description: Indulge in philosophy's most-loved fresh cream scent as you moisturize skin with fresh cream body lotion. the moisturizing formula contains macadamia seed and olive fruit oils, shea butter and antioxidants to help hydrate, soothe and soften skin. ReviewText: My favorite !! This Lotion smells so light and fresh, I bought it so it would not mix with my perfume. I can smell the Lotion and it is so light and sweet,not overpowering that when I wear it it compliments my perfume. I like that it has the pump which regulates how much I use, I think when using the smaller size I was using too much. I comes out heavy and think. I is NOT heavy and thick feeling when applied. I feels nice and light on my skin,is not sticky or greasy.Absorbs fast and leaves my skin incredibly soft !!
Title: Fresh Cream Lotion

Description: Indulge in philosophy's most-loved fresh cream scent as you moisturize skin with fresh cream body lotion. the moisturizing formula contains macadamia seed and olive fruit oils, shea butter and antioxidants to help hydrate, soothe and soften skin. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly to leave skin feeling silky soft and super smooth, while the fresh cream scent lightly scents skin and leaves you feeling wrapped in comfort.
ReviewText:
Fresh Cream sweetly scented... and oh so warm feeling upon your skin. Its simply delightful !*!*! I love this scent so much, I layer boldly !!! I start my ritual every night by beginning with my Purity cleanser, Massaging it onto my face and neck with my Clarisonic for at least 60 seconds... the longer the better. Then I apply the Purity Mask leaving it on until I wash it off in the shower. Now the Fresh Cream Party begins... I Shower, Shave and Shampoo with the Fresh Cream Shower Gel / Shampoo. I also use the body scrub. Then after drying I use the Fresh Cream Body Lotion then spray Fresh Cream Cologne over the lotion. The fragrance is Heavenly... Each and every one of the Shower Gels and Body Lotions are over the top great. Whatever your choice... you will be thrilled . Enjoy PHILOSOPHY.
Blessings,
Kokamo
Title: Softly Scented Fresh Cream...

Description: Indulge in philosophy's most-loved fresh cream scent as you moisturize skin with fresh cream body lotion. the moisturizing formula contains macadamia seed and olive fruit oils, shea butter and antioxidants to help hydrate, soothe and soften skin. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly to leave skin feeling silky soft and super smooth, while the fresh cream scent lightly scents skin and leaves you feeling wrapped in comfort.
ReviewText: This lotion is so good. When they first made the 3in1 i was so happy with the scent that i ended up buying multiples. For me and for gifts! The reason i love it so much is the vanilla is so authentic and not fake or too sweet. This is creamy, whipped, and so comforting. If i put this scent on in the morning i can still smell it on myself and my clothes at the end of the day. But it is not overpowering at all. This is great to wear daytime to nighttime. So relaxing after a hot bath or shower before bed. I bought a big size from another website thay sells philosophy but this is a great size. Doesnt take up much room in the bathroom but these tubes seem to last a while. I like to have the tubes in tote bags and as back up hand creams even though its body lotion. Also great to travel with these tubes since no pumps.
Title: A favorite

Description: Indulge in philosophy's most-loved fresh cream scent as you moisturize skin with fresh cream body lotion. the moisturizing formula contains macadamia seed and olive fruit oils, shea butter and antioxidants to help hydrate, soothe and soften skin. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly to leave skin feeling silky soft and super smooth, while the fresh cream scent lightly scents skin and leaves you feeling wrapped in comfort.
ReviewText:
I love this lotion and the scent is what really makes it over the top. Years ago, one of my girls received a sugar cookie lotion from one of those places at the mall in a gift exchange and I fell in love with the scent. I have been looking for something like it for years since, at least 8 years because 1) her lotion is long gone and 2) because it was made for kids it had glitter in it.

Well, fresh cream lotion is the adult equivalent plus. It isn't a strong overpowering smell, it is sweet and subtle. The lotion is a little on the thin side so you have to be careful how hard you squeeze the tube because a little goes a long way. This is easily my favorite Philosophy fragrance I have had in all my years of using this company's amazing products which started with chocolate ice cream shower gel I received as a gift.
Title: I have finally found it!

Description: Indulge in philosophy's most-loved fresh cream scent as you moisturize skin with fresh cream body lotion. the moisturizing formula contains macadamia seed and olive fruit oils, shea butter and antioxidants to help hydrate, soothe and soften skin. ReviewText: The lotion is wonderful and if feels great. I do not like the smell at all - it smells like cake and I don't want to smell like cake. It is very strong and kinda sickening. I tried mixing it with other philosophy lotion and it is tolerable but not great. Disappointed as this is the first time I've encountered something I didn't like the smell of. When I wore it someone else even said, what is that smell? and they weren't liking it either.
Title: Cake smell

Description: Indulge in philosophy's most-loved fresh cream scent as you moisturize skin with fresh cream body lotion. the moisturizing formula contains macadamia seed and olive fruit oils, shea butter and antioxidants to help hydrate, soothe and soften skin. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly to leave skin feeling silky soft and super smooth, while the fresh cream scent lightly scents skin and leaves you feeling wrapped in comfort.
ReviewText:
I love fall, winter, and anything sweet smelling! last year i bought the harvest spice lotion and i really loved it. i was waiting for another pumpkin lotion to come out but once i seen the fresh cream scent and all the wonderful reviews i decided: why not. it would be something different and i could always order the pumpkin pie body wash (which i did!). when i first put it on i thought it smelled like bath & body works "vanilla bean noel" (which was too sweet and I got sick of a long time ago). once i put it on i could smell more of the cream.

it's a good lotion! it's thick, not runny, not greasy. it's a sweet creamy vanilla that isn't too strong or overpowering, which for me that means i can wear it all fall and winter without getting burnt out on it! it's good, glad i bought it but at the same time it's not "the best smelling lotion i have ever owned!"
Title: Good but not "to die for!"

ReviewText: It took me a long time to try Fresh Cream. The thought of using products that smelled like dairy did not appeal to me. However, I finally purchased the body lotion last year and I must admit I do like it. It is a rich, sweet smelling, but not overpowering lotion. It does a great job hydrating my skin and smells divine. If Philosophy does expand the Fresh Cream line (as is rumored) I think I will add other items to my collection.

I WISH THEY MADE IT IN A PERFUME AS A YEAR-ROUND THING OR ADDED IT TO THEIR LINEUP SINCE IT IS SO DIFFERENT, BUT STILL HAS THAT LIGHT SCENT (INSTEAD OF BEING OVERPOWERING OR CHEMICALLY). IT IS REMINISCENT OF THE SMELL OF CREAM YOU POUR INTO COFFEE AS IT HITS- LIGHTLY TOASTED WITH A TOUCH OF SWEETNESS.

Title: Glad it's back, but scent is off

ReviewText: when i 1st got this lotion i was hugely disappointed that it smelled way different than the body butter. the lotion to me has a more "perfumey" note to it just like the body spritz does. I really didn't like the lotion or the spritz when i got either of them. but the more I use the lotion the more i am getting to like it. it is a close second to the body butter, which can never be replaced in my opinion. i guess i will have to settle for this lotion if the body butter is discontinued. i would suggest keeping both the lotion and the body butter available year round for those of us "fresh cream" addicts. I would gladly pay the extra money for the body butter over the lotion. *and* please please please make all of the fresh cream produtcs available to purchase through your website!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! it is rediculous to shop that other place and have to pay the *rediculous* shipping charges!!!!!

ReviewText:
i might think this fresh cream lotion was better if i hadn't used multiple tubes of the body butter first. the lotion has a perfumey vanilla scent (the spritz also has a perfumey vanilla scent) and not a delicious pure whipped cream vanilla scent like the body butter does.

the fresh cream line seems to be going in the wrong direction. we philosophy girls love love love the fresh cream body butter!! we want that smell!! the warm, creamy, comforting vanilla smell!!! if the body lotion and spritz were that same scent we would be soooooo happy!

fresh cream should always be available at philosophy.com and have it's own line of products--3 in 1, body butter, lotion, spritz, spray fragrance, hair conditioner, deodorant, and lip shine! it would be soooo popular! but, please skip the perfume note--we really want a true whipped cream (like the body butter) vanilla scent.

please listen philosophy. Why should us philosophy girls have to look elsewhere for a true vanilla scent?? especially when we're telling you what we want and what scent we love, and you have it but, you are trying to change it. why?

p.s. please, bring back the body butter.

ReviewText: light, soft and creamy... one of my "go to" scents
Title: mmmmmm

Description: Indulge in philosophy's most-loved fresh cream scent as you moisturize skin with fresh cream body lotion. the moisturizing formula contains macadamia seed and olive fruit oils, shea butter and antioxidants to help hydrate, soothe and soften skin. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly to leave skin feeling silky soft and super smooth, while the fresh cream scent lightly scents skin and leaves you feeling wrapped in comfort.
ReviewText:
i could go on and on about how much i love this fresh cream body lotion. i have several philosophy body lotions in the tube but there is something special about this formula. this is one of the creamiest, most luxurious and most hydrating lotions i've ever used. it just glides on and melts into your skin, giving you the smoothest, softest skin. the moisturization lasts and lasts, i'll use it at night after bathing and my skin still feels soft and velvety throughout the next day.

the scent is dreamy, a soft delicate fresh cream (think dairy) that is so comforting and soothing. no floral, citrus, fruit, bakery notes at all...and that's another reason i love it so much. it can be paired with any philosophy shower gel you have. it really is a universal and unisex scent.

this is not the fresh cream body butter which philosophy offered previously--that had a sweeter vanilla scent to it and was a butter/balm. this is a thick lotion, not as sweet and not a vanilla scent.

philosophy, please please keep the fresh cream products as a regular stock item, we need to be able to get them at any time! the 3-1 shower gel (original formula--award winning extra rich, please), and this body lotion supersized, and a nice big bar of soap and a spritz would make many of us very very happy. fresh cream is one of the best scents you've ever done.

10 stars if i could!!!
Title: my new favorite

Description: Indulge in philosophy's most-loved fresh cream scent as you moisturize skin with fresh cream body lotion. the moisturizing formula contains macadamia seed and olive fruit oils, shea butter and antioxidants to help hydrate, soothe and soften skin. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly to leave skin feeling silky soft and super smooth, while the fresh cream scent lightly scents skin and leaves you feeling wrapped in comfort.
ReviewText:
i am so very happy you brought us this new body lotion, thank you philosophy! the formula is rich and creamy without being too thick and sticky, and is unbelievably soothing, hydrating and softening to my skin. i haven't used such a luxurious lotion since you discontinued the when hope is not enough 3-6-9 replenishing body lotion. i wear it regularly, and layer it with the matching body spritz - it's so nice to fall asleep smelling the scent. i'm close to finishing off my second tube and plan to keep repurchasing this regularly, so please do not discontinue this!

where the original fresh cream body butter smelled exactly like philosophy's crispy marshmallow bars scent, this new lotion formula truly smells like part of the fresh cream line - it's wonderfully soft and lightly sweetened as if you'd just frothed milk or cream at home. i love that this lotion has a more subtle scent, especially since i love to lather it on from head and toe, and i feel confident that it won't overpower everyone in the room, like i did when i lathered on the original fresh cream body butter ;-)

even though the new lotion is subtle, the scent is still strong enough to last on my skin throughout the day, and still allow friends and loved ones who come close to me to notice it and compliment me on the soft fresh scent.

a request for philosophy: you know that the fresh cream line has such a huge fan base! please offer both the fresh cream body butter *and* body lotion, as well as the shower gel and body spritz on a regular year round basis! (p.s. if you super size the body spritz, please keep the regular size available as well, as those of us with small hands cannot handle the larger 16oz bottles!)
Title: much better than the original body butter!

Product Name: Lily Of The Valley Moisturizing Body Lotion
Description: This luxurious moisturizing body lotion is infused with Yardley London’s Lily of the Valley fragrance, which subtly blends crisp, feminine notes of lily of the valley with freesia. Containing refreshing lily extract, moisturizing shea butter, moringa oil and sunflower oil, rich in essential fatty acids and antioxidant vitamin E, it absorbs quickly into the skin to help combat the signs of aging, leaving it feeling soft, smooth and delicately fragranced.
ReviewText: Lucked out when I found this... A inexpensive, good quality, lovin' the long lasting impressionable smell. My skin feeling better, instantly! The non-sticky feeling on my body. That is 'Just Awesomeness!'
Title: Lily Of The Valley Moisturizing Body Lotion

Product Name: senorita margarita shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description:
you need this product if...
you are a true multi-tasker
you want to start your day with a smile
you love a rich foaming lather
you want to indulge in a margarita without the calories
you like fun, delicious smells that won't linger when your bath or shower is over
ReviewText:
summer just doesn't seem right without senorita margarita! i look forward to grabbing one every summer ... the scent is a wonderful mix of fresh lime and a bubbly effervescense, which i find absolutely and wonderfully invigorating to the senses. all you need to add to this duo is a cabana on the beach, some tropical music and a warm sunny day, and you've got everything just right!

i have also used the matching salt scrub which is also just amazing! after using it in the shower, i found that senorita margarita layers well with the eternal grace fragrance, since it picks up on the citrus notes ... but i would love it if senorita margarita came in a body spritz!
Title: ahhh ... summertime!

ReviewText: I was so disappointed when Philosophy stopped making the Lime Bath & Body Gel. So I stopped buying Philosophy! Then a friend told me about the Margarita Shower Gel, I smelled a tester & it's very close to the old Lime Bath & Body Gel. So I bought 4 bottles & I absolutely love it!!! I travel with it & use it as a face, body & shampoo cleanser & that saves tons of space & gives me more room for my makeup. And I'm constantly receiving compliments & asked what fragrance I'm wearing & it's just the Margarita scent. I also love the Melon Bath & Body Gel. They're my favorites & I would highly recommend both!
Title: Fantastic

ReviewText:
smells so much like a real margarita! very much a strong, citrusy, sweet lime scent, but there actually is a hint of saltiness and alcohol! it's a little uncanny, but amazing! well done, philosophy!

this one is definitely a classic philosophy scent for summer. invokes feelings of being on a white sand beach, sipping a margarita with your toes in the water! very invigorating in the mornings and help to wake me up! makes me very happy too and is a great start to the day - as is anything philosophy :)

of course, this also makes such amazing bubbles and leaves my skin so soft, smooth, and clean!

ReviewText:
i think this shower gel is one of philosophy's iconic products, and one of the ones that distinguishes philosophy's shower gels from other brands. it has the most creative and unique scent imaginable. yes it does smell like a margarita. it has the most incredible fresh tangy lime scent that is blended with a salty note that makes it so energizing and invigorating. it is also a terrific unisex scent that is so much fun to use.

senorita margarita is also one of philosophy's tea-lauryl sulfate formulas, which makes it very rich and creamy and extra moisturizing. this formula is too good to be true.

i can't even count how many bottles of senorita margarita i've used over the years. it is a nice change from all of my graces, florals, and foodie scents, and it is one of my philosophy favorites.

Product Name: senorita margarita shampoo, shower gel & bubble bath
Description:
you need this product if...
you are a true multi-tasker
you want to start your day with a smile
you love a rich foaming lather
you want to indulge in a margarita without the calories
you like fun, delicious smells that won't linger when your bath or shower is over
ReviewText:
I have used just philosophy 3-in-1 shower gels since I was first introduced to them over 6 years ago, and after all the flavors I've tried, this is definitely in my top three all-time favorites. This just bursts with tangy, wonderful lime. You can smell the lime, salt, mixer and all. There is a zesty freshness to it, a liveliness. If a scent can smell like happiness, this is it! Perfect for the summer, or in the winter when you need a sunny pick-me-up from the weather.

Like the other philosophy shower gels I've tried, this formula has a wonderful lather yet is safe for people with sensitive skin like me. Senorita margarita is a perfectly full-volume scent but doesn't stay with you once the shower is done. I love that Philosophy gives you so much incredible scent while in the shower- it just turns your shower into the most enjoyable experience. And with this particular shower gel- a downright party!

Description: Discover the 1st Biotherm BB Milk for Body. The nourishing properties of Biotherm's legendary Lait Corporel body lotion are enhanced with encapsulated micro pigments to improve skin's tone, while delivering the same 24-hour hydration of the original milk. One shade unifies all the unevenness in skin color and tone for a new world of body confidence. For your décolleté, arms, legs or any area on show, new Lait Corporel BB Milk smooths, unifies and illuminates in a naturally enhanced tone. Skin is intensely hydrated, protected and looks beautified, more radiant and refined. Irregularities are blurred. New Lait Corporel BB Milk is for all seasons, and all reasons. Glow with wellness all year long! luminous, even, naturally enhanced skin tone.
ReviewText: I am a 60 yr old male. My g/f got me started on Biotherm and I love it. 2 month's ago my g/f and I went to visit my 2 adult daughters and my ex-wife. Last month my youngest daughter and her fiancee came to the Bay Area to visit me. My daughter told me "I'm not supposed to tell you this but mom told me to find out what you're using on your skin because you have no wrinkles and look amazing for 60". As the title states "it doesn't get any better". I use Biotherm Blue Therapy (lift and blur) in the mornings after shower and the Lait Corporel Body Milk at bedtime. Best thing about this product : if I forget to apply for a day or 2 my skin stays silky soft.
Title: it doesn't get any better

ReviewText: Given that Biotherm is no longer available easily in dept. stores in the U.S., I had been moving away from using it because I didn't like having to order online and wait for delivery... However, I simply can't find any other moisturizer that works as well on my sensitive, itchy skin, so I'm back to placing orders. I love the citrusy scent (but also love that the scent dissipates rapidly) and the way it just absorbs easily into the skin and provides relief and softness.
Title: Best & most effective moisturizer I've found for sensitive skin

ReviewText: I bought this along with a gradual bronzer for a wedding I was in. It was a last minute solution that helped me even out my tan on my legs and shoulders. While I originally bought it for the tint, I ended up loving it for its intense moisturising power. It really helps dry skin without needing to use a heavy cream. It absorbs rapidly. I use it on my legs and the way it smells is divine, too. I like all the Biotherm products I have tried. Its worth the cost.
Title: Light, pleasant, citrusy scent

ReviewText: This is my first review here and this excellent moisturizer has inspired me to write one. The quality of my skin after using this is just perfection. I've always admired those people whose skin looks so smooth from head to foot even if they spend a lot of time outdoors, and I wondered how to get that look. I've tried many moisturizers but this one finally did it. Your skin will glow, will look and feel velvety and silky smooth, and the light orange scent is pleasant. It goes on smoothly with no oiliness or tackiness. You will want to show off your arms and legs. And if you have a lovely tan or naturally dark skin, then prepare for even more compliments. I have since decided to buy the matching shower milk and scrub when I was spending time on the Côte d'Azur in the hot sun and the combo set kept my skin glowing. Biotherm is great!
Title: Perfect skin

ReviewText: I first starting using this product in 1979 when I bought it in Germany and have used it ever since. Even had it shipped to Canada before I could get it here. It is the best lotion on the market. It absorbs into the skin leaving it soft and hydrated without the greasy/ oily feeling with the lovely scent of citrus. It also helps keep the mosquitos away in the summer. Love this product and as well as the Eau Vitaminee body lotion! Won't use anything else.

ReviewText: I've used this for over 25 years. It hasn't been easy to find. It's my favorite because you can use it from your face to your toes! It has a beautiful delicate fragrance. It has light creamy texture which absorbed quickly into your skin. It's so refreshing because your skin feels like it just got something it's been craving and is so happy!!! I love all the Biotherm products I've used. It has just been hard to find. So happy it popped up in my email!

One shade unifies all the unevenness in skin color and tone for a new world of body confidence. For your décolleté, arms, legs or any area on show, new Lait Corporel BB Milk smooths, unifies and illuminates in a naturally enhanced tone. Skin is intensely hydrated, protected and looks beautified, more radiant and refined. Irregularities are blurred. New Lait Corporel BB Milk is for all seasons, and all reasons. Glow with wellness all year long! luminous, even, naturally enhanced skin tone.

Description: New Autobronzant Tonique focuses on body with its twin action bi-phase texture. Bi-Phase Texture with a double-action self-tanning phase. Naturally uniform blended tan. Easy application toning to sublimate skin tone. Soft and radiant uniform tan. Smooth and satin-like skin.
ReviewText:
I absolutely love the smell of this product, as well as the texture, so easy to apply without having tan lines! I would ask Biotherm to specify clearly some instructions of use, because I didn't know at first if I should just spray it onto my skin or rub it.
With respect to the results, I'm really satisfied as this product is the ONLY one I've tried that doesn't look on me "orange". With the very first apply I achieved a beautiful sun-kissed-like look, which I really love.
The bad point is the quality of the container itself. My first purchase was deficient, as the spray button got stuck so many times.
Title: Nicest auto-bronzer I've ever tried

Description: New Autobronzant Tonique focuses on body with its twin action bi-phase texture. Bi-Phase Texture with a double-action self-tanning phase. Naturally uniform blended tan. Easy application toning to sublimate skin tone. Soft and radiant uniform tan. Smooth and satin-like skin.
ReviewText: The product mus be sprayed and not rubbed. When apply the smell is nice and sweet, but when the product interact with the skin the smell become very intense, too much. Also, the product did marks maybe because we should not rub it. Well, I was a marble woman for couple of days!!

Product Name: After Sun Replenishing Moisture Care for Face and Décolleté
Description: It immediately comforts the skin and repairs damage caused by UV rays, protecting skin against free radicals which remain active even after sun exposure.  The skin remains beautiful and your tan incredibly radiant.
ReviewText: I know this product is meant to be an after sun moisturizer, but here in California that means it is an ideal daily moisturizer under sunscreen. Nice and light and soothing for skin that is constantly exposed to the sun. I'm so happy to see it available in the USA again, I've been stocking up with every trip to Europe!

Title: soothing and healing after sun skin care

Description: New Aqua-Gelée Autobronzante. Association of hydration expertise and self-tanning, Biotherm integrates the self-tan formula of Aqua-Gelée Autobronzante in a serum texture for a glide-on application and a natural result on the face. Biotherm brings its hydration expertise to selftanning: a self-tan formula in a light and fresh serum texture for a glide-on application and a natural result.
ReviewText:
i usually really like biotherm products so i am sad to give a negative review, but i have never had any success with this product. i have used this several times, after careful exfoliation, sometimes with and and sometimes without a tanning mitt, but i always end up with a streaky tan. i don't think it's my technique, i frequently use other brands and have no problem.

i gave it two stars because it at least gives decent colour apart from the streaks. i think this product could be improved if it went on tinted so i could see where i am putting it. i know it says that it's tinted on the packaging but i really don't find that to be the case.
Title: streak city

Description: New Aqua-Gelée Autobronzante. Association of hydration expertise and self-tanning, Biotherm integrates the self-tan formula of Aqua-Gelée Autobronzante in a serum texture for a glide-on application and a natural result on the face. Biotherm brings its hydration expertise to selftanning: a self-tan formula in a light and fresh serum texture for a glide-on application and a natural result.
ReviewText: I have been using this for a while now in combination with St. Tropez/LovingTan self-tanners, and I must say it's an amazing product! It's gives you a subtle glow that you can build on and maintain with regular use, and doesn't smell awful like most self-tanners. Also, it goes on nicely and doesn't leave a mess after you wash your face. In order to apply this correctly, you must exfoliate gently, wash and dry your face, wait about ten minutes and then apply. When applying, start with cheek area and span it outward, almost as though you were trying to blend in a foundation. Then tackle the T-zone regions, again blending it outward. You should be going towards the hairline in the forehead and temple region in order to ensure an even look. Let it dry and enjoy!
Title: Amazing Product When Applied Properly

Description: New Aqua-Gelée Autobronzante. Association of hydration expertise and self-tanning, Biotherm integrates the self-tan formula of Aqua-Gelée Autobronzante in a serum texture for a glide-on application and a natural result on the face. Biotherm brings its hydration expertise to selftanning: a self-tan formula in a light and fresh serum texture for a glide-on application and a natural result.
ReviewText: This stuff is AMAZING. I have been using it for a few months now and I have zero complaints. Doesn't streak, fades evenly, not too dark (which is good for my fair-light complexion) and gives the perfect glow. I switched to this after trying a few others facial self tanners and this is by far the best. Also had no issues with breakouts or sensitivity. If you want to get really dark, I don't know if this will do that but for a light-medium glowing colour, it's perfect.
Title: Obsessed

Product Name: English Rose Body Moisturizing Body Lotion
Description: This luxurious moisturizing body lotion is infused with Yardley’s London’s English Rose fragrance, which subtly combines refreshing , light rose with notes of rose bud, magnolia and cassis. Containing revitalizing rose water, moisturizing shea butter, evening primrose oil and monoi oil, rich in essential fatty acids and antioxidant vitamin E, it absorbs quickly into the skin to help combat the signs of aging, leaving it feeling soft, smooth and delicately fragranced.
ReviewText: I have used this product before and liked it.  The packaging with the pump is very convenient.  There is a minimum of extra ingredients as well.  Overall very good product
Title: Easy to use

Title: Great features !!

Description: This amazing 3-in1 product is a self-tanner, a moisturizer and sun care with SPF. Its whipped moisture texture glides effortlessly onto skin for easy application. Featherlight, with a light fruity scent, it promotes an incredibly natural-looking tan, with or without the sun. Enriched with hydrating Mirabelle oil and SPF 15 skin stays smooth and protected against harmful UVA and UVB rays. Use anytime of the year for an incredible, long-lasting and healthy-looking glow. Great for face and body.
ReviewText: If you want an instant tan...you will want this! I use o go to tanning beds all the time to get the tan I want, but not anymore, I would use this product a few times and I'm at the tan I want. It's amazing and I would highly recommend it to anyone over fake baking in the sun or bed. I would also recommend washing your hands after you use this product. If you don't, you will have orange hands. Only downfall about this product would probably be the smell, many people may like it but I don't....unlike the other Clarins products.
Title: Instant Tan!

Description: This amazing 3-in1 product is a self-tanner, a moisturizer and sun care with SPF. Its whipped moisture texture glides effortlessly onto skin for easy application. Enriched with hydrating Mirabelle oil and SPF 15 skin stays smooth and protected against harmful UVA and UVB rays. Use anytime of the year for an incredible, long-lasting and healthy-looking glow. Great for face and body.
ReviewText: I have been using Clarins sun care for over 25 years. The SPF and self tanner was my first Clarins purchase and have been using it ever since. I was a little disappointed when I found out last year that the lotion Self tanner with 15 SPF was discontinued. It went a lot further than this mousse whip cream and therefore was a better value. But you will never go wrong buying a Clairns sun care product.  Definitely the best on the market
Title: Love this self-tanner and SPF in one

It spreads smoothly and leaves you with a beautiful sun-kissed tan that you would have to spend many hours in the sun. It doesn't smudge off on your clothes and dries quickly. Top product.

Product Name: i think you are wonderful fresh cream gel and body lotion
Description: What can be more wonderful than indulging in fresh cream? The i think you are wonderful gift set features fresh cream shampoo, shower gel, bubble bath in 240 mL size, and fresh cream body lotion in 240 mL size. These moisturizing formulas leave skin hydrated, soft, and delicately scented with a touch of sweet fresh cream. It's the perfect gift to let someone know how wonderful they are by showering them with sweetness.
ReviewText: The "Fresh Cream" scent is amazing!  It smells good enough to eat!  It is sweet, yet not overpowering.  The body lotion is moisturizing without being greasy.  The scent lingers throughout the day, without being overwhelming.  I would give the cream five stars on its own, but I found the shower gel / shampoo / bubble bath product to be a bit disappointing.  It doesn't smell quite as authentic as the cream.  It does lather well and serves its purpose, but it wasn't my favourite.
Title: I think this is wonderful!

Product Name: Sun Control Stick SPF30 for Sun Sensitives Areas
Description: Developed for sun-sensitive or very exposed parts of the face (nose, lips and ears), this sun stick is perfect when playing water sports, skiing and or when in intense sunlight.
ReviewText: I purchased this product based on a recommendation by a Clarins rep because they had discontinued my all-time favorite product--Sunscreen Wrinkle Control for Eyes. I was told that this product was intended to replace that product and is also for use on lips. Well, it is not an equivalent product. The texture is greasy and does not play well with eye cover, shadow, or powder. This product also irritates the skin under my eyes. The Sunscreen Wrinkle Control for Eyes sunk in with light patting and was a great foundation for other products. It went on smooth and never caused irritation.
Title: Not for Eyes

Product Name: Sun Control Stick SPF30 for Sun Sensitives Areas
Description: Developed for sun-sensitive or very exposed parts of the face (nose, lips and ears), this sun stick is perfect when playing water sports, skiing and or when in intense sunlight.
ReviewText: I carry this in my purse to protect my eyes. I'm in and out all day and won't let the lids get sunburn!

Title: Excellent sun lip protection

Description: An after sun skin soother with a comforting, highly moisturizing texture to soothe and intensively hydrate the skin, and quickly restore its softness and freshness.
ReviewText: This hydrating moisturizer specifically made for sun exposure is so rich and creamy and nicely soaks into the skin leaving it feeling adequately moisturized after sun bathing. I used it while on a trip where I spent several days at the beach and it helped my skin feel so much better after spending several days outside in the sun. Would be great any other time as well. I highly recommend this product!
Title: Wonderful moisturizer!

Description: An after sun skin soother with a comforting, highly moisturizing texture to soothe and intensively hydrate the skin, and quickly restore its softness and freshness.
ReviewText:
Insanely rich! Ultra Hydrating is the perfect name for this body cream. Aside from summer, I'd use this every day, year-round if they offered it in a luxury size.
Whether you've been in the sun or not, this is an incredible indulgence. And it has the most amazing fragrance, too.
Title: Beat Body Cream Ever!

Description: An after sun skin soother with a comforting, highly moisturizing texture to soothe and intensively hydrate the skin, and quickly restore its softness and freshness.
ReviewText: My peeling body got on the airport at Mexico and 3 stewardesses said I had to get some of this Clarins. I did and love it. It moisturizes for a whole day so you don't need to keep applying and my tan stayed longer! Will only buy this for my tropical vacations.
Title: Stewardess recommended!

Description: An after sun skin soother with a comforting, highly moisturizing texture to soothe and intensively hydrate the skin, and quickly restore its softness and freshness.
ReviewText: This is one of the few products I have bought consistently for at least 25 years. I love the way it smells and how it feels on my skin. I wish Clarins would bring back the sun scent that mimicked the scent of this moisturizer.
Title: love this

Description: An after sun skin soother with a comforting, highly moisturizing texture to soothe and intensively hydrate the skin, and quickly restore its softness and freshness.
ReviewText:
I love to lather this on after a day at the beach! This product has a great scent to it, and is very light on the skin. It has a cooling effect once applied to keep your skin cool, after a long day in the sun!

Love it!
Title: Great effect, great smelling product!

Description: An after sun skin soother with a comforting, highly moisturizing texture to soothe and intensively hydrate the skin, and quickly restore its softness and freshness.
