Product Name: Repairwear Uplifting Firming Cream SPF 15 (Very Dry)
Description: A light, richly moisturizing cream that visibly tightens, lifts, and firms the face and neck to rebuild skin's youthful appearance with the added important SPF 15 protection benefit. The unique formula helps empower skin to "defy" gravity by helping rebuild firming natural collagen. Skin appears smoother and more lifted. Allergy test. 100% fragrance free.
ReviewText: I received a generous sample of this cream with a Clinique purchase and with one use, fell in love. The texture is light and smooth and blends onto cleansed skin easily. There is no typical "sunscreen" smell rather, it is fresh, like most Clinique products are. Best of all, it is multi-purpose and works beautifully for my older but still Combination complexion.

Description: This 100% natural loofah is a great exfoliator for the skin.  With regular use, your skin will become noticeably softer and smooth.  Wet loofah and apply your favourite BATH RETREAT body wash and rub in a circular motion. Care Instructions: Rinse thoroughly, squeeze out excess water and hang to dry.  Avoid using on face or sensitive skin.
ReviewText: I've been using natural loofahs since I was a kid back in Brazil. Took me a long time to find a decent one in Canada. I can't use anything too rough on my skin, and usually body scrubs are too coarse. And I won't get a facial scrub to use all over my body, that's crazy! So, this natural loofah works great, I use it daily with any soap. It helps you to get rid of any bumps you have and it helps heal ingrown hairs. Just use some lotion after shower, and you'll have soft awesome skin!

For the first time, Biotherm, experts in breakthrough gel textures, pioneers a body gel. Following the insight that today’s overscheduled lives don’t leave much time for waiting around on body lotion, Biotherm develops its freshest body gel.
ReviewText: Delicious orange scent and absorbs nicely with no sticky feeling
Title: Refreshing for summer

Description: Another beauty-award winning self tanner from Clarins, this product really is liquid bronze. Perfect for special events or when you want a healthy glow quickly. As refreshing as water and as gentle as a milk, this vitamin-packed tanner delivers color effortlessly to face and décolleté with natural-looking results, while keeping your skin soft and healthy-looking. Easy-to-apply, quick drying and streak-free, its slightly tinted tone makes it virtually mistake proof. Results are subtle and you will see your sun-kissed results in just a few hours.
ReviewText: I use this very thin, milky liquid once per day to maintain the perfect sun kissed glow on my face and neck. I don't use any other tanner on my face since all the other ones seem to clog my pores. I'll wash, tone (with a few sprays of Thayer's Witch Hazel), lightly moisturize then smooth on a thin layer of this tanner, avoiding the eyebrows and upper lip. It has a light fragrance and gorgeous silky finish. It leaves my skin free from breakouts and one $30 bottle lasts forever. Try it, you won't regret it!
Title: Best Face Tanner - Like Skincare!

ReviewText: Bought this product about 2 months ago after running out of my holy grail powder with low expectations for it. The first time I used it, I fell in love! The sponge applicator applies the product like a beauty blender, the product formula is almost a powder-to-cream and has almost NO fallout. I've worn it to the pool, the beach, out and about on humid summer days, dance classes, and it hasn't failed to keep my skin matte all day. A must have product!
Title: Lasts FOREVER!

ReviewText: Clinique most definantly leads the way in skincare and makeup which won't cause skin irritation or to further breakouts. I've used this powder quite a while, it replaced another Clinique powder I used before. This powder is Mineral so it's great on your skin and doesn't clog pours and it doesn't make your makeup look cakey if you want to put it over your Foundation to stop oilines or if you're sweating a lot somewhere warm. It's the perfect finishing powder and it's so light on your skin and the compact lasts a good three months. Seriously it will not disappoint you unless you're looking for a heavier skin toned face powder. As well, they do have this color in a very light shade for fair skin tones. It's the perfect product to buy the next shade up if you're skin becomes darker on vacation or in the summer. Just using the darker powder is an excellent way to match your tan and also put on sunscreen which is in the powder with an SPF 15.
Title: Greatest Mineral Powder with a Touch of Colour

ReviewText:
I've been using the almost powder cover up for 3yrs know. I've tried several other cover ups that leave my face dry and patchy.

If your looking for the best Coverup that doesn't leave any goop try Clinique!
Title: Best Coverup for a natural look!

ReviewText: This has become my go to powder. Lightweight and does not get that "cakey" look after a few hours.

ReviewText: From the time I discovered the first Biotherm fragrance for men during a trip to Paris, I have found your products to be the best among the many deluxe lines of French skin preparations. Unfortunately, you discontinued the fragrance, which I had been subsequently able to purchase in New York for several years. It was clean, subtle, light and not arrogantly drawing attention to itself from a distance. When others noticed it, they always said how wonderful it was -- as are all your products I've tried and continue to use. Biomains is the finest hand cream I've ever found, but it is no longer available for purchase in the US market. I buy it at CDG when I find it in stock, and friends bring it to me when they are coming for a visit. You have never marked successfully in the United States, and I don't understand that.

Product Name: Sunscreen Control Cream For Face Very High Protection SPF 30
Description: This high protection sunscreen product is perfect for sensitive skin or skin exposed to prolonged sunlight and harmful UVA and UVB rays. This lightweight cream also moisturizes skin, helping prevent sun-induced skin aging as it promotes an even, long-lasting tan. Phyto-Sunactyl 2 Complex promotes a more even tan by providing reinforced protection to preserve your skin's youth and beauty. Offers SPF 30.
ReviewText: I have dry, sensitive skin , and being fair, have had Basel cell skin cancers. I need a product that is effective, yet gentle. Clarins for the face has great coverage, and is thick enough so you use an adequate amount. It smells nice ( some sunscreens don't!) and gives me peace of mind when I am in the sun playing tennis or at the beach. I also like the added benefit of wrinkle protection.

Title: Works

Description: The fluid and light texture of MUGLER Prodigy Body Lotion dissolves softly into the skin leaving it perfectly hydrated and delicately perfumed in the ALIEN fragrance.
ReviewText: This body lotion has exactly the same scent as Alien perfume. Not only it is very strongly scented that you actually can wear on its own, but also it has a nice golden shimmer to it makes it a perfect body lotion during summer days or paired with Alien perfume - for special occasions.
Title: beautifully scented lotion

Product Name: Exfoliating Body Scrub for Smooth Skin
Description: The essential first step to achieving a firm, youthful-looking body. This refreshing exfoliating treatment—with smoothing Natural Bamboo Powders—casts-off rough, flaky surface cells and impurities, giving body skin a sleek new start. Extracts of Mimosa and Shea caress skin with a delicate veil of softness. Preps skin for the treatments to follow.
ReviewText: This product has a really nice texture to it. The scrubbing particles are fine so they do the job well without agitating the skin. I use this on my belly postpartum and follow it with either the tonic or the firming lotion and I saw a visible difference within a week or two. Obviously postpartum skin is very sensitive and this is the only product that I feel is effective without hurting my belly. An added bonus for me is that is smells good without being too powerful. I would not hesitate to give this product a try!
Title: Gentle yet works effectively!

Title: Please don't ever discontinue this product!,

Description:
For face and body, this sun protection product was formulated to protect skin that is very sensitive to sun exposure. The rich, fine texture helps promote an even tan. Water and perspiration-resistant, it also protects against the drying effects of salt water. 
-Ensures reinforced sun protection (heat-resistant UVB-UVA and Infra-red filters) adapted to sensitive skin.  
-Promotes more rapid tanning thanks to a melanin precursor. 
-Phyto-Sunactyl® provides reinforced Multi-Cellular Protection, anti-free radical. 
-Nourishes, softens and revitalizes skin.
ReviewText: There is a good reason why this is sold under the body subcategory of sunscreens. It's a rich moisturizer that leaves a lovely sheen on the body but would definitely be too oily for the face. If you want a face sunscreen that melts into your face, the UV PLUS HP with SPF 40 cannot be beat: it truly disappears into the skin. This one, however is great for the body and while I use the UV PLUS HP on my face, I use this product on my neck and chest every morning, and all over my arms and legs when I am outside in the summer. I love the scent and it keeps my neck skin moisturized and protected.
Title: Greta for the body, not for the face

Description:
For face and body, this sun protection product was formulated to protect skin that is very sensitive to sun exposure. The rich, fine texture helps promote an even tan. Water and perspiration-resistant, it also protects against the drying effects of salt water. 
-Ensures reinforced sun protection (heat-resistant UVB-UVA and Infra-red filters) adapted to sensitive skin.  
-Promotes more rapid tanning thanks to a melanin precursor. 
-Phyto-Sunactyl® provides reinforced Multi-Cellular Protection, anti-free radical. 
-Nourishes, softens and revitalizes skin.
ReviewText:
I have very fair skin and had many sunburns in my youth during the 90s when we weren't as concerned about skin cancer as we were about getting a great tan! Now, as an adult living in a southern climate I'm always concerned about sun exposure. I tried a lot of different brands and was put off by the chemical or overly perfumed smells, some were really sticky and left residue.

This sunscreen is absolutely delightful - but my favorite thing is the lovely faint lavender scent. It makes putting the sunscreen on feel like an indulgence rather than a chore, and when you live somewhere that requires daily application, it's wonderful to have a sunscreen that acts like a luxurious moisturizing lotion. Despite the much higher cost than other brands, I have no qualms about buying and recommending this product.

The only thing missing is a coordinating eye care product, as this is unsuitable.
Title: Can't Live Without It!

ReviewText: This sunscreen is extremely greasy. Even when you shake it vigorously, straight oil comes out before the cream. It also has a very strong "sunscreen" smell that started to irritate my eyes and senses. It also makes your eyes sting after a few hours. I do think that it works (hence 2 starts instead of 1 star), but it's definitely not for me and I wouldn't buy it again.

A great addition to my beach bag

ReviewText: Received a sample of this fragrance and fell in love!
Title: In love with Jimmy Choo

Description: These beautifully scented, creamy body butters are enriched with shea butter and quince extract to soften, moisturize, and rejuvenate the skin. Sunflower, almond, and avocado oils nourish, thus helping to improve elasticity and smoothness.
ReviewText: I wasn't too fond of the smell the first time I used it. It kind of reminds of me the lemony dish detergent that I use at home. However, it started to grow on me as I continued to use it. It is a "butter" after all and is very rich in texture. It can feel a little heavy upon application but sinks into the skin nicely and your skin will feel super soft after. I use it mostly in the winter but is also a great skin hydrator during those hot and dry Alberta summers.
Title: Rich texture

Description: These beautifully scented, creamy body butters are enriched with shea butter and quince extract to soften, moisturize, and rejuvenate the skin. Sunflower, almond, and avocado oils nourish, thus helping to improve elasticity and smoothness.
ReviewText: I bought this a few days ago, and I'm already addicted to the scent...not to mention how smooth and soft it leaves my skin! Love it!
Title: Smooth skin and divine scent!

Description: Change your tone! This refreshing body treatment—with a firming blend of Ginseng and Apple Seed Oil—soothes dryness, improves vitality and promotes the appearance of toned, supple-looking skin. Refreshes the senses with the aromatic essences of Geranium, Rosewood, Mint and Rosemary. Non-oily texture delivers a satin-fresh finish. Smooth on after Tonic Bath & Shower Concentrate and Tonic Body Treatment Oil for a professional, at-home spa treat.
ReviewText: I've been using this lotion for years.  Whenever I try something else I react to it.  The scent is wonderfully subtle and sort of earthy, not at all floral.  I often use it on bug bites or other skin irritations and it takes any itchiness away.  It keeps my skin soft and moisturized and is never greasy.  It absorbs very quickly.  I can't tell about toning because I've used it for so long, but I do feel my skin is in good condition because of it.
Title: The best body lotion!

Description: Change your tone! Smooth on after Tonic Bath & Shower Concentrate and Tonic Body Treatment Oil for a professional, at-home spa treat.
ReviewText: I use the Toning Body Balm after a shower. Your skin feel soft and fresh!
Title: Wonderful product!

Description: A rinse-off, oil-based cleanser specially formulated for quick, easy removal of higher SPF formulas that are water resistant.
ReviewText: I received this for free in my voxbox courtesy of Influenster. I thought this was a good cleanser and definitely works well with the rest of the products I received in my box, being the sports BB cream, and UV protection cream. The thing I don't like about this product is it is not meant to be used on the eyes. This is unfortunate considering when I use the BB cream I also tend to wear makeup and would prefer an oil cleanser that does it all. I currently use the Neutrogena cleansing oil, it's a third of the price and does just as good of a job and is meant to clear all makeup including eye makeup. So while this product is good...I'm sorry but it won't replace my Neutrogena one.
Title: Not worth the money

Description: A rinse-off, oil-based cleanser specially formulated for quick, easy removal of higher SPF formulas that are water resistant.
ReviewText: I received a free sample of this product courtesy of influenster. It was my first time ever trying a cleansing oil and i have to say I really love the product especially as someone with dry skin. While it is a bit greasy to put on at first (duh it's an oil) after you wash it off you're left with velvety soft skin which isn't greasy in the slightest. Took off all my make up so quick. Highly recommend!
Title: Love it

Description: The magic of MUGLER's ANGEL perfuming shower gel pampers your skin. It transforms into a foamy mousse when wet, moisturizing the body and leaving a lingering veil of the designer ANGEL fragrance with the Intense Diffusion System (IDS Technology).
ReviewText: I bought this bath gel as a graduation gift for myself and I positively love how pampered I feel each and every time I use it!
Title: Sweet Scent!

Description: The magic of MUGLER's ANGEL perfuming shower gel pampers your skin. It transforms into a foamy mousse when wet, moisturizing the body and leaving a lingering veil of the designer ANGEL fragrance with the Intense Diffusion System (IDS Technology).
ReviewText:
My fragrance of choice is Angel, so I bought this shower gel. I have been pleasantly surprised that it doesn't aggravate my extremely sensitive skin, as long as I rinse it off within a few minutes :-) :-)

It also smells wonderful, and not too strong :-)

2 summers ago, I discovered an awesome, unanticipated feature: it repels mosquitos!!! Normally, I am the person who will be covered in mosquitos, while everyone else with me has to deal with maybe 1 or 2. I went for a hike in the woods with family, in the B.C. Interior, after taking a shower and using this Angel Shower Gel. I was the ONLY person not bitten by mosquitos!!! I did a bit of experimenting after that, and when I began my day by showering with this Angel Shower Gel, I received zero mosquito bites! I have occasionally had a brave mosquito land on me, but never been bitten!!! :-) :-) :-)
Title: Wonderful and repels mosquitos!

Description: The magic of MUGLER's ANGEL perfuming shower gel pampers your skin. It transforms into a foamy mousse when wet, moisturizing the body and leaving a lingering veil of the designer ANGEL fragrance with the Intense Diffusion System (IDS Technology).
ReviewText: First time to purchase last week and i love it and will get again
Title: Angel Shower Gel

Product Name: Eight Hour Cream Intensive Moisturizing Body Treatment
Description: A perfect companion to our original classic and just what the body needs.
ReviewText: I tried Elizabeth Arden's Eight Hour Cream Intensive Moisturizing Body Treatment on the recommendation of a salesperson for a competing company. I could not be more pleaseed with how it performs. My skin is smooth, soft, and practically wrinkle free -- especially for someone who's 48 years old! As a man, I really like the fact that this product is fragrance free. Also, it's non-greasy and goes on all over in less than a minute. I recommend it to anyone who asks what I use to give my skin (in the words of more than one female coworker) "that beautiful, healthy glow -- I mean it just glows!"
Title: Could Not be Happier

Product Name: Eight Hour Cream Intensive Moisturizing Body Treatment
Description: A perfect companion to our original classic and just what the body needs.
ReviewText: This cream is superior to any other I have ever used!! I received the mega sized jar as a gift, so when I ran out of my previous bedside cream, I opened this. For the first second I didn't think I liked the scent, but I put some cream on my feet and legs, and on my hands, shut the light and closed my eyes to go to sleep. I swear - in a couple seconds the scent permeated my being and I slept deeper and better than ever. In the morning I could still feel the moisture everywhere I had applied the cream. Now, about 4 months later - it's a huge jar - my skin is like velvet and I can't go to bed without applying this cream. It's totally non-greasy and has not come off on my sheets at all, and I don't know what I'm going to do because it costs over $300 for the jar!!!
Title: I'm addicted

Product Name: Eight Hour Cream Intensive Moisturizing Body Treatment
Description: A perfect companion to our original classic and just what the body needs.
ReviewText: I use the eight hour body treatment on my dry feet. It keeps my feet looking great. I put it on at night, put on a pair of foodies and the next morning the dryness is gone. I use this every three or four days and it works great. I tell my friends about this product. I even had a friend that took me shopping with her so I could show her exactly which product to use. She is as satisfied with this product as I am!
Title: Great for dry scalely feet

Product Name: Eight Hour Cream Intensive Moisturizing Body Treatment
Description: A perfect companion to our original classic and just what the body needs.
ReviewText: I love this intensive moisturizing cream! Night time seems to be the best time to use it, because it will stay on all night. I love to use it on my feet, legs, lips, arms and hands. Basically, it is perfect everywhere! I have found it is really good to soften cuticles also. I also carry this product in my handbag, since you never know when you'll need it.
Title: Great Moisture

Product Name: Eight Hour Cream Intensive Moisturizing Body Treatment
Description: A perfect companion to our original classic and just what the body needs.
ReviewText: I grew up with 8 hour cream. My mom had us put it on boo boos. As an adult I use the 8 hour cream in the winter to treat the weather abuse my hands endure. The Eight Hour Cream Intensive Moisturizing Body Treatment is great for the rest of my body. Love it as well and the 8 hour Intensive Hand Cream.
Title: Growing up with 8 hour cream

Title: This stuff rocks!

This moisturizing, comforting body care instantly smoothes away lines, leaving skin soft and satin-smooth.
ReviewText: This is the best body lotion hands down. I put this on top of my Body Fit lotion and oh my god, super soft and smooth skin. I couldn't stop touching my skin. I even made others touched my skin to feel how soft and smooth it is. The scent is super subtle and my skin absorbed the lotion and stays just as soft and smooth. It is also non-greasy so I can put on my clothes immediately after. Ok, let's move on to the firming, toning and lifting qualities of this product. This definitely tones and it does help with the firming but again I use it on top of the Body Fit lotion. They both work so well together.

ReviewText: I use this lotion and mix it with the Body Shaping Supplement and get the best of both worlds. You get the firming action of the lotion with the anti-cellulite action of the supplement. The smell is ok, but I would prefer a more fruity, youthful scent. It does fade after a while but you can definitely smell it until it does. That's the only drawback for me. Its worth trying if your looking for a good firming lotion.

Description:
A must-have moisture-extreme, re-energizing, sweet-lime scented body butter cream for supreme skin smoothing. 

Loaded with shea and cocoa butter, almond and coconut oil, and a super refreshing triple whammy of lime oil, kiwi water juice, and lime tree blossom extract,  Soap & Glory’s ultra rich body buttercream is irresistible. 

Scented with Sugar Crush- Sweet Lime & Vanilla Musk fragrance.
ReviewText: I bought this a couples months ago and it makes  my skin incredibly soft and smooth! I put this on after the shower and usually at night, and it sets on my skin very quickly, which is good for me because I don't usually like the liquid feeling of moisturizer on my skin for too long.  The sweet, sugary smell is incredible, but not over doing, which is great. It doesn't leave any residue on my skin and it glides on lusciously. I've used many moisturizers before, but none of them have lived up to this one. A little goes a long way with this, so you it'll last you a while. My daughter and I use this daily and we both love it! I will defiantly be repurashing.
Title: My holy grail moisturizer

ReviewText: I ordered this online after coming back from a sun holiday to keep my skin hydrated, as I was starting to peel. I use it right after the shower, and my skin is super soft, hydrated, and the scent is divine! I would definitely recommend this product.

ReviewText: I'm not usually a cake smelling person when it comes to lotions, but this strawberry & cream lotion is DIVINE!! Besides the  amazing scent, it works wonders on dry hands. It is so thick and luxurious, and absolutely nourishing on dry skin. Just perfect for the winter months!  It Absorbs into skin very quickly and doesn't leave any greasy residue behind which is another major bonus!! I can't wait to  buy more of this lotion, and I am 100% going to try the rest of the product range in this line!! Highly recommend giving this new product a shot! Fantastic price point too for gift giving.

ReviewText: This is the one sun product that I never leave home without! The non-greasy formula is perfect, and it's just the right amount of coverage from the sun while still letting me get a healthy summer tan without the burn!
Title: Summer Essential!

Product Name: Sunscreen Care Oil-Free Lotion Spray for Outdoor Sports Moderate Protection SPF 15
Description: Non-oily and invisible on the skin, this spray-on sun treatment is suitable for combination or oily skin types. Promotes a natural and radiant-looking tan.
ReviewText: I have never used Clarins sunscreen before but I ended up with slight burn from my previous go-to brand. I was very pleasantly surprised by this sunscreen. It's super lightweight and has a nice soft smell that doesn't smell at all chemically. This is not a spray like you think of from a box store brand, this is a pump action that creates a fine mist more like you would see from a hair product. It's super creamy and absorbs into the skin very quickly. I was a little hesitant on how much would be needed but about 6 squirts generously covered my entire legs. I used this for the first time seeing my nephews' soccer game and I was in direct sun for over an hour. This product worked amazingly well! It didn't sweat off, didn't streak, provided great coverage and I didn't even get any redness anywhere! I have super sensitive skin that is more on the fair side; I will burn and then tan. This didn't irritate my skin or my allergies and my skin was super soft into the next day. I didn't even need more lotion at the end of the night. You can't go wrong with this product, it's amazing and I'm hooked for life!
Title: Definitely worth the money

Product Name: Sunscreen Care Oil-Free Lotion Spray for Outdoor Sports Moderate Protection SPF 15

Description:
Limited Edition
100 ml Golden glass bottle with a golden cap.
The Tonic Oil firms, tones and improves elasticity, smoothing the appearance of stretch marks. Preservative-free.
ReviewText: I received this oil with two other stretch mask control as a preparation for my pregnancy. I haven't tried the stretch mask products yet, I tried this oil last night after shower, I have to say I was truly shocked. My dry skin absorbed the oil very quickly and became very soft afterwards. I can imagine my skin after a bottle of usage. This product really renew my opinion on Clarins. The only thing I don't like is the smell. I think I need more time to get used to that. So far, this oil can be counted as my favorite skin care product.
Title: Excellent Product

Limited Edition

I'm on my second bottle....and very pleased with the results. I've found the scent strong so I personally use it at night...Due to my success with this product I have purchased a few other creams from Clarins.

Description: This luxurious moisturizing body lotion is infused with Yardley London’s English Lavender fragrance, which subtly combines fresh, light , calming English Lavender with notes of geranium, chamomile and eucalyptus. Containing soothing Lavender extract, moisturizing shea butter, borage oil and rosehip oil, rich in vitamins A, C and E, it absorbs quickly into the skin to help combat the signs of aging, leaving it feeling soft, smooth and delicately fragranced.
ReviewText: I use this moisturizer at night. Apply it to my feet, legs, arms and hands. It feels wonderful and smells so lovely. The scent helps me to relax and drift off to sleep

ReviewText: I use this lotion while applying the perfume. Its very soft and leaves your skin silky. I received it with perfume purchase in a set

Description: Did you know that 70% of women aged 20 and older suffer from shiny skin, enlarged pores and imperfections? Help your skin look perfect and pure with the triple-action power Pure.Fect Skin. Featuring L.Digitata, a powerful marine algae that produces a powerful purifying anti-bacterial protection, this complete range helps to matify your skin while keeping it hydrated, balanced, and clear of imperfections.
ReviewText: I have a problem with my skin all the time about sensitive, acne, and oily skin. This product fixes my problem all. At first, I was not sure that it was going to help me because the perfume was quite strong. Anyway, it is amazing that I found this products. It helps my skin is more smoother. My acne is GONE!!!. I recommend this to my friend. It gives the same result as well. Also I try to change to another line which is liquid but the result is not the same. I die with this one. If anyone is seeking for product that really helps. I recommend this one.
Title: Perfect Skin as It said

I use this soap in a shower so I clean not only my face with this soap but also my chest and back as well. These were the areas that I tended to break out as well, and now they're clear. The soap has a nice colour and scent too.

I think this is a keeper. Glad to have it back into my life Biotherm! Thanks!

Title: love it

Description: For clear, unblemished skin without sensitivity, the Clarisonic Normal Brush Head provides an invigorating cleansing experience. Also ideal for men to help prepare skin for an extra smooth shave.
ReviewText: I accidentally purchased the normal brush head today due to the confusing signs and not paying better attention. I have combo skin and my face is a tad sensitive but i don't know how anyone even with the toughest skin can use this. It's way too harsh for the face and it made me not enjoy using my clarisonic at all. I am exchanging this brush head for the sensitive head but even the brush head specialized for pores were better than this one.
Title: Say NO to the normal brush head

Description: For clear, unblemished skin without sensitivity, the Clarisonic Normal Brush Head provides an invigorating cleansing experience. Also ideal for men to help prepare skin for an extra smooth shave.
ReviewText:
I recommend this brush if you have difficulty with clogged pores. You only have to hold it lightly for it to work. I was using the Sensitive Brush that comes with the Mia's but going over the same area too much to get it to work on my pores. I don't recommend doing that. I broke a capillary on my nose using the product incorrectly. Totally my fault.

I have the white Mia 3 cleansing brush. Has 3 speeds hence the name. Feels comfortable in the hand. Use lots of water with it and it will be gentle on your skin but clean it thoroughly.

The Mia 3 is about the same as the Aria which has the same 3 speeds and brush head. I could not compare them at the same time, but while in a store lifted the base/stand of the Aria. I felt it was a little lighter then the Mia 3 stand. I like the heavier base better. 

Did you know inside the Mia's, when you remove the brush the pins are made of gold so they do not rust. How great is that!
Title: Works Very Well

Description: For clear, unblemished skin without sensitivity, the Clarisonic Normal Brush Head provides an invigorating cleansing experience. Also ideal for men to help prepare skin for an extra smooth shave.
ReviewText: I have been using the sensitive brush twice daily to get a quick and thorough glowing clean. I do add an extra 30 to 60 seconds to clean my neck to my collar bone...an area that is forgotten too often. Then I slather on my serum and moisturizer which absorbs thoroughly and I feel like I just had a complete facial at a spa! I LOVE my Clarisonic Mia 2!!!!
Title: 60 second clean

Description: For clear, unblemished skin without sensitivity, the Clarisonic Normal Brush Head provides an invigorating cleansing experience. Also ideal for men to help prepare skin for an extra smooth shave.
ReviewText: I ordered this with the idea it would perform better than the brush that comes with the unit when first purchased. To date, I’ve not noticed any discernible changes in my skin. I do use a cleanser which deep cleans my pores, so at least that has remained constant. I still need to use a blackhead remover to get all the excess sebum from my pores.
Title: No noticeable difference

Description: For clear, unblemished skin without sensitivity, the Clarisonic Normal Brush Head provides an invigorating cleansing experience. Also ideal for men to help prepare skin for an extra smooth shave.
ReviewText: This brush head is so soft, it feels like Momma's hands on a newborn. Also, any cleanser applied to the skin gets extra bubbly and foamy because of the fine texture. It feels great and still does a thorough job of cleaning.
Title: soft, soft, soft

Description: For clear, unblemished skin without sensitivity, the Clarisonic Normal Brush Head provides an invigorating cleansing experience. Also ideal for men to help prepare skin for an extra smooth shave.
ReviewText: This brush head is my favourite. It feels so soft on my skin (softer than the sensitive skin brush head), yet I still feel it cleans my face well. I really recommend for those with sensitive skin!
Title: So soft!

Description: For clear, unblemished skin without sensitivity, the Clarisonic Normal Brush Head provides an invigorating cleansing experience. Also ideal for men to help prepare skin for an extra smooth shave.
ReviewText: I wouldn't say that this head is too gentle! It delivers the perfect amount of strength to clean thoroughly yet doesn't leave my skin sore!
Title: Love!

Description: This sheer, light-weight oil absorbs and penetrates quickly to condition skin without leaving a sticky or greasy residue and helps to keep skin radiant and supple.
ReviewText: Very moisturizing and has a pleasant scent. Great for people who don't like super floral or fruity smelling products
Title: Herbaceous

Description: In addition to high protection, it was important for Biotherm to include anti-aging benefits in their line-up of sun products designed for the face. Soin Solaire Visage is a true multi-tasker. The formula is enhanced with a [BIOPEPTIDE + BIOELASTIDE] complex to slow the deterioration of the elastic fibers in the skin. Bioelastide inhibits the enzyme that, when activated by UV light, damages elastic fibers in the skin. At the same time, it also stimulates elastin synthesis* for a firming effect. Biopeptides increase fibroblast multiplication* and stimulate collagen synthesis, a process that is weakened by the effects of UV rays. *In vitro test
ReviewText: I got this in the spring to prepare for summer. Very good broad spectrum with high spf. However, everytime I wore this, I noticed my face to be so dark on photos. I read a review for this product of a girl having the same issue and I realized with the high spf, the product oxidizes after sun exposure. It's too bad since it's very moisturizing for my combo skin but had to return it. :(
Title: Oxidizes

Description: In addition to high protection, it was important for Biotherm to include anti-aging benefits in their line-up of sun products designed for the face. Soin Solaire Visage is a true multi-tasker. The formula is enhanced with a [BIOPEPTIDE + BIOELASTIDE] complex to slow the deterioration of the elastic fibers in the skin. Bioelastide inhibits the enzyme that, when activated by UV light, damages elastic fibers in the skin. At the same time, it also stimulates elastin synthesis* for a firming effect. Biopeptides increase fibroblast multiplication* and stimulate collagen synthesis, a process that is weakened by the effects of UV rays. *In vitro test
ReviewText: I bought this product a couple weeks ago. I have been looking for a good sunscreen to wear daily. I have been using my skincare underneath it and it applies wonderfully on top of all my other products. I do a full face of makeup on top of it and it lasts all day. I love it.
Title: Wonderful Sunscreen

Description: In addition to high protection, it was important for Biotherm to include anti-aging benefits in their line-up of sun products designed for the face. Soin Solaire Visage is a true multi-tasker. The formula is enhanced with a [BIOPEPTIDE + BIOELASTIDE] complex to slow the deterioration of the elastic fibers in the skin. Bioelastide inhibits the enzyme that, when activated by UV light, damages elastic fibers in the skin. At the same time, it also stimulates elastin synthesis* for a firming effect. Biopeptides increase fibroblast multiplication* and stimulate collagen synthesis, a process that is weakened by the effects of UV rays. *In vitro test
ReviewText: I have been wearing this sunscreen for two weeks now. There is a very subtle scent to it that dissipates after a few minutes. It also leaves a sticky feeling on my dry skin. However, it did not cause me any breakouts and it does not leave a white cast.
Title: A Little Sticky

Description: Are you looking for a fast and easy sun-kissed look, whatever the season? Gelée Auto-Bronzante self-tanning Gel (FAIR) gives your body a natural and uniform tan that also offers 24h hydration.
ReviewText:
i usually really like biotherm products so i am sad to give a negative review, but i have never had any success with this product. i have used this several times, after careful exfoliation, sometimes with and and sometimes without a tanning mitt, but i always end up with a streaky tan. i don't think it's my technique, i frequently use other brands and have no problem.

i gave it two stars because it at least gives decent colour apart from the streaks. i think this product could be improved if it went on tinted so i could see where i am putting it. i know it says that it's tinted on the packaging but i really don't find that to be the case.
Title: streak city

Description: Are you looking for a fast and easy sun-kissed look, whatever the season? Gelée Auto-Bronzante self-tanning Gel (FAIR) gives your body a natural and uniform tan that also offers 24h hydration.
ReviewText: my mom bought me this because i hate being pale and i stopped tanning in the beds. It felt okay but no matter how many times i tried it was always streaky and blotchy so i wasn't overly in favour.
Title: okay but not great.
